PC_KOL_130251171.desc_indo: Datang ke sini untuk berbicara dengan Kang Yan dan mendapatkan petunjuk.

PC_KOL_267431159.desc: Pick up gong fragments from the rooftop·1

PC_KOL_267431160.desc: Touch the soldiers on the watchtower and get three gong fragments
PC_KOL_267431160.desc_mandarin: 瞭望塔上触摸士兵，获得铜锣碎片·三
PC_KOL_267431160.desc_indo: Sentuh tentara di menara pengawal dan dapatkan tiga pecahan gong

PC_KOL_267431161.desc: Pick up props on the ground and get two gong fragments.
PC_KOL_267431161.desc_mandarin: 拾取地上道具，获得铜锣碎片·二。
PC_KOL_267431161.desc_indo: Ambil alat peraga di tanah dan dapatkan dua pecahan gong.

PC_KOL_267431163.desc: Climb up along the invisible stone ladder (you can see the outline when the wind and sand blow by), or use Qinggong, free construction, or jumping to climb up (recommended). Ring the gong and withdraw the troops to complete the mission.
PC_KOL_267431163.desc_mandarin: 沿着隐形石梯上来（风沙吹过的时候可以看到轮廓），或者利用轻功、自由建造、跳跳跳爬上来（荐），敲响这个铜锣，鸣锣收兵，即可完成任务。
PC_KOL_267431163.desc_indo: Naiki tangga batu yang tidak terlihat (Anda dapat melihat garis luarnya saat angin dan pasir bertiup), atau gunakan Qinggong, konstruksi bebas, atau melompat untuk memanjat (disarankan). Bunyikan gong dan tarik pasukan untuk menyelesaikan misi.

PC_KOL_267431173.desc:
It’s the time of year when Zaili businessmen meet to return to Populus euphratica. On the sand dunes south of Populus euphratica, there is a businessman who seems to be scratching his head and looking for something...

Pre-adventure [Golden Country], please note that after completing it, you will have to wait for a while before the NPCs here will spawn.

Come here to talk to Chen Ruyue and get clues.
PC_KOL_267431173.desc_mandarin:
又是一年宰利商人相约回到胡杨集的时节，在胡杨集南边的沙丘上，有一位利商人似乎抓耳挠腮地在找什么东西…

前置奇遇【黄金乡】，注意做完之后要等一会儿这里的NPC才会刷出来。

来此对话陈如月，获得线索。
PC_KOL_267431173.desc_indo:
Ini adalah waktu ketika para pengusaha Zaili bertemu untuk kembali ke Populus euphratica. Di bukit pasir di selatan Populus euphratica, ada seorang pengusaha yang sepertinya sedang menggaruk-garuk kepala mencari sesuatu...

Pra-petualangan [Negara Emas], harap diperhatikan bahwa setelah menyelesaikannya, Anda harus menunggu beberapa saat sebelum NPC di sini muncul.

Datang ke sini untuk berbicara dengan Chen Ruyue dan mendapatkan petunjuk.

PC_KOL_269911119.desc:
In the northern suburbs of Populus euphratica, there is a Moshan Taoist disciple wandering around...

Talk to the NPC Jue in front of you three times, choose the persuasion technique, and get clues.
PC_KOL_269911119.desc_mandarin:
胡杨集北郊，有一名墨山道门人徘徊着……

和面前的NPC玦对话三次，选择话术劝说，获得线索。
PC_KOL_269911119.desc_indo:
Di pinggiran utara Populus euphratica, ada seorang murid Tao Moshan yang berkeliaran...

Bicaralah dengan NPC Jue di depan Anda tiga kali, pilih teknik persuasi, dan dapatkan petunjuk.

PC_KOL_269911122.desc: Pick up "Jue Fang Zhi Notes 2" here
PC_KOL_269911122.desc_mandarin: 此处拾取《玦方志手记二》
PC_KOL_269911122.desc_indo: Ambil "Catatan Jue Fang Zhi 2" di sini

PC_KOL_269911157.desc:
1. Come here to talk to Ali, choose [Pay to buy information], and then use the thaumaturgy [Photograph the Stars and Get the Moon] to get the prop on his body - the blood-stained red tassel.
2. Return to Granny Pan, talk to Nong Chao'er, and hang the red tassel on the red tassel gun next to it to complete the task.
PC_KOL_269911157.desc_mandarin:
1.来此对话阿里，选择【花钱买消息】，然后用奇术【摄星拿月】取到他身上的道具-染血的红缨。
2.回到磐婆婆那里，对话弄潮儿，将红缨悬挂在旁边的红缨枪上即可完成任务。
PC_KOL_269911157.desc_indo:
1. Datang ke sini untuk berbicara dengan Ali, pilih [Bayar untuk membeli informasi], lalu gunakan thaumaturgi [Foto Bintang dan Dapatkan Bulan] untuk mendapatkan penyangga di tubuhnya - rumbai merah berlumuran darah.
2. Kembali ke Granny Pan, bicara dengan Nong Chao'er, dan gantungkan rumbai merah pada pistol rumbai merah di sebelahnya untuk menyelesaikan tugas.

100360__.desc:
The coachman traveling to and from Shenxiandu will tell you that business in Lirenlei will not be easy this year. The main road from the south of Shenxiandu to the outside world is occupied by unknown forces.

Zhao Weiye. You can gain insights by talking before burning the village (you can make up for the mistakes through friends online after burning the village): Business is difficult to do

361181__.desc:
Everyone in Qinghe knows that Chunqiu Villa was once the leader in the Qinghe martial arts world. But few people know that there was an organization called Hanging Sword behind it. But since the sudden closure of the Spring and Autumn Annex three years ago, the Xuanjian organization seems to have disappeared from the world.

Here you can listen to the two embroidered gold tower monsters talking and unlock the information: Hanging Sword

409109__.desc:
In ancient times, there was a cat-betrothal gift. Cat owners often fed the cats with dried small fish and other materials. If the cat accepted the dried small fish, it could take the kitten home.

After unlocking the ability to communicate with all beasts, you can unlock the knowledge: The gift of hiring a cat by standing next to the cat after burning the village.

609004__.desc:
There is a metal ring tied to the myna's leg. It looks like the ring is man-made. Could it be that someone is teaching these myna how to speak?

A crow will appear under the boundary monument. If you pick it up, you can get a myna anklet and unlock the story: The man behind the scenes. Then open the Wulin Record - All Living Beings - Desolate Forest - Insights to get a group of clues.

701077__.desc:
The first pear tree in Shenxiandu was planted from a pear tree brought by Han Xiangxun from his hometown. Later, Uncle Zhou led the villagers to graft branches from this pear tree, creating this scene of gods crossing the pear blossoms.

Come to the bottom of the tree to explore this big pear tree and unlock the knowledge: The first flower

701079__.desc:
Every year during the Drunk Immortal Moon, Tian Bu Shua disappears for a period of time. Some people say that they once saw traces of Tian Bu Shua at the ferry. At that time, he was dressed as a fisherman. Where did Tian Bu Shua go?

Talk to Yao Yaoyao and choose [Ask Uncle Tian] to get it

1020585__.desc:
Song Jiu's words remind you of a legend about the village. It is said that there is a deserted temple in the south, and its name is Ghost Temple. There are many evil spirits in the temple, and only by burning paper during festivals can we avoid their worries. The village keeps it secret and treats it as a forbidden area.

Song Jiu. Dialogue Unlock Information: The Forbidden Land in the South

1024002__.desc:
When you drink from others, you will not envy the gods. If you want to drink the best Li Ren Tea, you must go to the Bu Xian Xian Inn opened by the founder of Li Ren Tea, Han Xiangxun. The greedy traveler narrated this incident in her travel diary. Take a look at what she wrote!

I picked up the travel notes on the table·Don’t envy the immortals. Unlockable Insights: Wine Tasting Travel Notes

1025008__.desc:
Fog filled the entire village, and the madman in front of the village seemed to be talking about sending people on their way.

madman. Dialogue unlock information: Crazy words and crazy words

1025032__.desc:
This is a cat owner who has been deliberately cultivating free food among humans through being cute. According to Cat Border Cat, it is very close to success!

After unlocking the telepathic beasts, here you can trigger the knowledge of the cat next to you: Cat Master

1025034__.desc:
The villagers of Huanghun Village once believed in a god named Lu Xian. But later, this god disappeared without a trace, and the people in the village gradually developed a strange petrifying disease, and even eventually became crazy...

Use rockets to shoot the incense burner in front of the Deer Fairy's painting. After stopping for a while, you can unlock the information: Deer Fairy Sacrifice. and clue one

1025035__.desc:
It seems that only some clothes are buried in the tomb in Fenghe Village. The little white guy in the village, with his dog life, I guarantee that he definitely saw and smelled it right!

After unlocking the mind and beasts, you can unlock the knowledge here: the tomb of clothes.

1025037__.desc:
An ambitious Brother Xiong is more than just dominating his own one-third of an acre of land. In order to meet the challenge, Brother Xiong decided to eat fish to replenish his body. It seems that the fat fish here is very beautiful!

After learning how to communicate with all beasts, looking at the nearby bears will randomly trigger information: Brother Bear’s Ambition

1025039__.desc:
Ah Huang is a puppy raised in the village, and you feed him frequently. Well, now I’m looking for you to hug me again!

rhubarb. Recording unlocks the Housekeeper Dragon. After learning animal language, you can listen to the story here: The Fiery Ah Huang

1025040__.desc:
Those weird birds seem to be performing a mission to scare away outsiders. Who is the owner behind these birds and why do they do this.

After unlocking the mind and beasts, if you come here and encounter the myna flying by chance, you can unlock the knowledge: the owner of the myna.

1025042__.desc:
Some monks look like eminent monks during the day, but at night they cannot escape the fate of petting cats!

After learning how to communicate with all kinds of animals, stop for a moment and unlock the knowledge: Cat Lugging Master

1025043__.desc:
Rumor has it that as long as you can ride a white-haired goat and avoid being knocked down by them, you will have the opportunity to learn legendary martial arts moves. Of course, this is just a legend.

After learning how to communicate with all beasts, you can unlock knowledge near this sheep: the art of domestication.

1025044__.desc:
The owner of Fuma Village seems to be able to communicate with these horses. If you hadn't been able to understand the language of animals, I'm afraid you would have already put the owner of Fumama Village on the list of hysterics!

 After learning to know all the beasts, you can unlock it next to the horses here.

1025045__.desc:
According to legend, a master once arrived in a stone boat and became an immortal. This legend is very similar to another story about Luo Shen. But Han Xiangxun once told you that the so-called fairy tales are just illusions.

Lu Kangge. Dialogue to gain information: Jiuqu Stone Ship

1025047__.desc:
It is said that the bells of the Taiping Bell Tower can determine peace, at least in the eyes of the rabbits in the mountains. There seem to be more bad guys in the mountains and fields, and even Rabbit is worried about his wealth and life.

After unlocking the telepathic beasts, you can unlock the knowledge: The Vanishing Bell near the gray rabbit.

2101028__.desc:
The rabbit in Cixin Town is puzzled by the people living in the holes in the village. Why would someone compare themselves to a mouse?

After learning how to communicate with all beasts, you can unlock information near the cave rabbit: claiming to be a rat.

2500056__.desc:
Since the Zhenguan year, Yang Zunzhi, the ancestor of the Yang surname, led Zhou Zihui, Pan Zigang, Xie Zhisong and others to travel thousands of miles to Shanmiaozhou in Qinghe to study Buddhist carving skills. The four major surnames flourished here because of Buddhist carvings. Zhou, Pan and Xie were all headed by the surname Yang.

Yang family tree. Unlock the information after picking it up: Centennial Heritage

5000252__.desc:
"Since the Buddhist extermination a few years ago, the stonemasons who carve Buddhas in the town have all disappeared. There are fewer and fewer boats coming to Cixin Town, but more and more people are going out by boat." The ferryman at the ferry said. Sejong's extermination of Buddhism brought disaster to this small town that relied on Buddhist carving craftsmanship.

Zhou Zhou. Dialogue can unlock insights: The end of inheritance

5000260__.desc:
Fenghe Village was established only four or five years ago. According to the villagers, Fenghe Village was originally a wasteland, but a great benefactor helped them build the village so they had a place to stay.

There are many swallows and valleys. Dialogue unlock information: The great benefactor of Fenghe Village

5000265__.desc:
For some reason, the villagers in Fenghe Village did not believe that the Northern Expedition had failed. They worked hard to grow food, believing that the food they planted would help the Northern Expedition.

Yan Quanding. Dialogue can unlock knowledge: Northern Expedition and Food

5000275__.desc:
There is a mysterious granary in Fenghe Village. It is said that the food saved by the whole village in the past few years is stored there... It is heavily guarded and no ordinary people can approach it.

farmer. Dialogue to unlock information: The mysterious granary

5000283__.desc:
Yan Xiaochui from Fenghe Village is an orphan picked up by blacksmith Yan Tiechui from the battlefield in Saibei. Yan Xiaochui no longer has much impression of his hometown, but he wholeheartedly wants to return to Yanbei to retrieve his parents' ashes.

Yan Xiaochui. Dialogue can unlock information: the child picked up.

5000286__.desc:
It is said that Yan Chi, the head of Fenghe Village, is an old servant of Chunqiu Villa.

Yan Xiaocao, Yan Xiaofang. Eavesdropping to unlock: The origin of the village chief

5000289__.desc:
The villagers of Fenghe Village were very sad when Emperor Sejong passed away, until the village chief Yanchi came to Fenghe Village... Yanchi seemed to have found a new direction for the villagers.

Yan Sigui. Dialogue Unlock Information: Sad Fish

5000292__.desc:
The villagers in Fenghe Village have a common determination to hoard food. They would rather tighten their belts and live a better life, but also save food rations and hoard them.

Yan Zhun, Yan Chi. Noon. Eavesdropping yields insights: Shared determination.

5000296__.desc:
Yan Chi, the head of Fenghe Village, came to Fenghe Village only three years ago and became the village head not long after he arrived. Although it didn't last long, the villagers all recognized the village chief.

Swallow butterfly. Dialogue to unlock knowledge: The amazing village chief

5000307__.desc:
Vendors who come to Fenghe Village to do business say that Wuhe wine, a specialty of Saibei, sells particularly well in Fenghe Village.

Xiao Yao. Dialogue can unlock information: Saibei Wuhe, and Natural History: Perfume Shop

5000309__.desc:
Fenghe Village's attitude toward the Northern Expedition was completely different from that of the outside world. Outsiders think that the Northern Expedition has failed, and Fenghe Village should accept this reality. But the villagers don't agree... They feel that the Northern Expedition will one day be realized. Although their strength is meager, they can help a little bit.

Yan Xiaoer. Dialogue provides insights: useless or useful

5000311__.desc:
Villager Yan Pengniu seems to have a key to the granary of Fenghe Village.

Yan holds the cow. Conversations unlock insights: where is the key.

5000315__.desc:
In addition to doing farm work, the villagers in Fenghe Village also practice martial arts from time to time. It is said that in case they need to fight in the future, they can answer the call and go to take back Yanbei together.

Coach Yan. After the dialogue, you will unlock the information: the reason for practicing martial arts.

6200266__.desc:
According to rumors, a few days ago, the Star Picker who stole the Canglang Sword Manual appeared in Zhao Pu's house. Where there are star-catchers, there must be Canglang sword manual. Now many people in the world are staring at Zhao Pu's house, preparing to steal the sword manual.

Chen Guang, Wu Sheng. Unlock insights after eavesdropping: Canglang Sword Manual
--Note: The NPC will disappear after completing the Heroic Traces [Volume 4: Shadow of the Sword on the Railing].

6200270__.desc:
The belated wages of the craftsmen finally started to be paid, and all the craftsmen thanked the general who had been relieved of his military duties.
You can get it by talking to NPC Wudutou.

6200429__.desc:
Many officers and soldiers in Kaifeng City are strictly investigating the private soldiers. Anyone who carries them will be confiscated by the government.

Cai Yucheng. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Private soldiers are strictly prohibited

6200431__.desc:
Nowadays, the world values ​​literature over martial arts, and many people in the world abandon martial arts and follow literature. The disciples of Wenjin Hall have their own opinions on this.

Wen Yu. After selecting the third option in the dialogue, "Settling one's life with military force and establishing one's life with literature," the knowledge will be unlocked: Emphasis on literature and restraint on martial arts.

6200432__.desc:
Da Dao Chen, the owner of the fish dumpling stall, seems to be hiding some identity. He intercepted the drawings from a high-level craftsman a few days ago and is currently trading with people in the world.

No, Da Dao Chen. Unlocking information after eavesdropping: Warship Blueprint·2

6200433__.desc:
At the mountain climbing bazaar, Xu Ran was praising the scenery of the Royal Garden as beautiful as Jiangnan, but when asked if he had been to Jiangnan, he hurriedly denied it. He claimed that he had inferred the scenery of Jiangnan from the clothes of the tribute envoy, and left in a hurry.

Xu Ran. Unlock the information after the conversation: Jiangnan Sui Gong

6200435__.desc:
The emperor gave a banquet to the new scholars in the Yuyuan Banquet Hall. But before the banquet started, there were already vendors at the mountaineering market vying to sell the same wine as the Shizi Banquet.

Zheng Qian. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Qiong Lin gives a banquet

6200436__.desc:
In order to build the imperial mausoleum, building materials were piled inside and outside the city, and workers worked day and night.

Sun Dalu. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Daxing Construction · 2

6200437__.desc:
Workers at Yiqiumen kept transporting the materials needed to build the imperial mausoleum day and night. However, we learned from the workers’ chats that most of the building materials were shipped to the navy base.

Wang Dazhuang. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Daxing Construction · 1

6200438__.desc:
Official Chen Sheng was carefully instructing the forbidden soldiers who were transporting food and wages, and mentioned that many spies from other forces had been captured recently among the people on spring outings.

Chen Sheng. Insights on unlocking after eavesdropping: mixed personnel · 2

6200439__.desc:
Wonton stall owner Wang Dacai has been suffering from a headache recently. For some reason this year, many strange spring tourists came. Instead of ordering wontons, they asked about the drawings of the grain trucks. It was really puzzling.

Wang Dacai. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Mixed people · 1

6200445__.desc:
Recently, a man came to the outing market who claimed to be proficient in astrology, attracting girls to flock to him.

Xing Xuan. Unlocked after the conversation: Insights: Astrology Scholar

6200562__.desc:
It seems that a businessman with a Bashu accent is searching for warship blueprints. The merchant also mentioned that someone sent them to investigate the navy of the Song Dynasty in depth.

Liu Xing. Unlocking information after eavesdropping: Warship blueprint·1

6200571__.desc:
The Wu Temple enshrines military generals from past dynasties and is an important place in the Song Dynasty. The Song Dynasty placed heavy troops to guard this place to show respect for the generals.

Fang Qing. After the dialogue, you will unlock the information: The martial temple is very strict.

6200577__.desc:
Some visitors noticed something strange about the martial arts temple. The Wucheng Temple has been completed, but it is heavily guarded and guarded. The Wucheng Hall does not allow anyone to enter... If it is just a temple, why is it like this?

Liu Hai. After the dialogue, you will unlock the information: Strange Events in the Martial Temple

6200594__.desc:
After releasing their military power over a glass of wine, several powerful founding generals resigned from their military posts one after another and retired due to illness. According to the soldiers, these generals often come and go here. I don’t know if it’s for worship, or if it’s something else?

Chen Xu. Unlock the information after eavesdropping: Secret secrets of military commanders

6200608__.desc:
In Qionglin Garden, someone once witnessed a big bird flying in the sky. It is unknown who built it.

Du San. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Big Bird

6200623__.desc:
According to Jinmingchi Central News, General Murong, who is in charge of the navy, has not been seen for a long time.

Zhao Xiaoliu and Wang Dajiu. Insights Unlocked after Eavesdropping: The Faceless General

6200629__.desc:
The Wude Division received an informant's report that Shi Shouxin used the guise of building a martial arts temple to privately own arms and refuse to pay military expenses, so he sent a spy here to investigate the case.

Su Du and Chen Qilai. Unlock the information after the conversation: Ordnance private casting case

6200637__.desc:
The "iron goods" secretly traded in the arena are actually hoarded in the hands of officers and soldiers.

Tian Ye. Insights on unlocking after eavesdropping: Iron Goods·Part 3

6200638__.desc:
Craftsmen from all over the country who were ordered to come to Beijing to build imperial gardens have already filled the inns in the west of the city.

Tian Meiniang. Unlocked after the conversation: Overcrowded

6200640__.desc:
The belated wages of the craftsmen were not sufficient, and the amount of money collected by the gentleman who was not leading the army was not enough to pay all the back wages.

Wang Ai. Uncovering insights after eavesdropping: Late payment of food·Part 2

6200646__.desc:
The hilltop where the Martial Arts Temple is located is where the "iron goods" secretly flow out.

Wang beard. Insights on unlocking after eavesdropping: Iron Goods·Part 2

6200649__.desc:
The general named Rong Yuan was a disciple who rebelled from Moshan Dao. He betrayed his master and also betrayed the "non-attack" discipline.

Xu Hao. Unlock the information after eavesdropping: The Traitor of Momen

6200650__.desc:
The clay pots carrying stone fat are flammable at the touch of a touch and are an important part of Jinmingchi's armament. Compared with the previous orders placed by Murong Yanzhao, Rong Yuan needed a lot more for some reason.

Hu Hu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Clay Pot Order

6200651__.desc:
Since the completion of the Martial Arts Temple, the legend of "the god of death leaves the temple and the soldiers are hidden in the arsenal" has been circulating in the world.

Liu Shizhu. Shen Shi’s eavesdropping revealed the story: The God of Death left the temple

6200653__.desc:
The grotto excavated at the foot of Wumiao Mountain is a supporting cave for Wumiao Temple. The main statue in the center is King Jiang Taigong of Wucheng. Bai Qi is not among the supporting statues of "Ten Philosophers of Wumiao Temple".

Follow the road. Unlock the information after the conversation: Statue of Wu Temple

6200655__.desc:
The market formed by the settlement of craftsmen who were summoned to Beijing has a dazzling array of dyes, and many painters and craftsmen buy here.

Axiu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Lottery City

6200659__.desc:
Near the craftsmen's settlement, a batch of items called "iron goods" are being circulated. The matter is kept secret and they have to be accepted privately. All forces want to take advantage of it.

Wang Zhi. Unlocking experience after eavesdropping: Iron goods·Part 1

6200682__.desc:
The ore sold in the lottery market has been sold at extremely low prices recently. Rumor has it that due to the civil unrest in Jinghu, the mine owners are looking for a way to sell their goods and sell them at low prices.

Ruan Alu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Jinghu Mine

6200684__.desc:
Among the tributes sent by Bashu, in addition to strange playthings, there were also a lot of grain, rice, gold and silver.

Stone sea. Unlocked after dialogue: Tribute

6200686__.desc:
Recently, many cargo ships carrying tribute from Bashu have stopped at Feihua Ferry.

Niu Wu. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Tribute from Bashu

6200688__.desc:
Kaifeng has recently gathered many craftsmen from all over the world.

Qin Dali. Unlock the information after the conversation: Foreign Artisan

6200690__.desc:
This canal diverts water from Kaifeng and flows into Pipa Valley. According to the canal builder, this canal is much wider than ordinary canals.

Zhang Yu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Opening canals and diverting water

6200692__.desc:
The workers changed shifts once a day, and the canal repair work continued day and night.

Dalin. Unlock the information after the conversation: Canal construction day and night

6200694__.desc:
In the middle section of the ancient canal, there is a large banyan tree that has encroached on the river channel. The roots of the tree have been exposed and were temporarily reinforced with scaffolding. Due to the construction of the canal, this ancient tree, which is believed by the surrounding villagers, will soon be removed.

Mr. Qin. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Sacred Tree

6200713__.desc:
In this generation, the wheat fields that farmers once had were moved to the east after the government requisitioned the canals, but the wheat fields there were in trouble.

Minon. Unlock the information after the conversation: Farmland Catastrophe

6200715__.desc:
Looking at the foot of the Huainan cliff, there is a drunken old man who is very skilled in martial arts. He is no match for the best warriors in the army. Maybe he can compete with him.

Liu Niuer. Unlock the information after the conversation: Drunk old man

6200824__.desc:
The Feilaishou construction project at Pipa Valley has stalled, and people who want to go to the imperial garden can only take a detour through the mountain road.

Zhang Chunhua. After the conversation, you can unlock the information: Flying cable.

6400176__.desc:
The hardness of Kaifeng mountain rocks varies, so there are many test caves left in the mountains. Folk rumors say that the test exploration of the rocks was caused by dividing gold and fixing caves to find the dragon veins and caves of the New Dynasty.

Cui Chun. Unlock the information after the conversation: Xunlong Branch Meridian

6800318__.desc:
The West Relic Pagoda of Daxiangguo Temple enshrines the body relics of Zen Master Huiyun, the founder of the temple. Many people come here to pray around the pagoda for longevity. The monks Jingqing disagreed with this. The Buddha's bones existed because of Nirvana. For all living beings, there is no essential difference between Nirvana and death, and time is nothing but a shackle for those who have experienced the suffering of the world.

Pure and pure. Unlock the information after talking to Youshi: Buddha Bones

6800319__.desc:
There is a severe drought in various states this year, and not long ago, there was even a fire at the Daxiangguo Temple. The pure wisdom of the monks cannot bear the suffering of all living beings. They chant sutras and pray for blessings every day, but only hope that the weather will be smooth. Not long ago, the emperor visited the Daxiangguo Temple and prayed for rain with eels, and the drought actually eased.

Pure wisdom. Unlock the information after the conversation with Chenshi: Praying for Rain

6800320__.desc:
The fire-headed monk of the Daxiangguo Temple secretly hid meat and meat, and was punished by Zen Master Hongjing to dredge the Bianshui River. The temple's Dianzao had to do the fasting for the past few days, which was really hard to swallow. But there seems to be another hidden reason behind the fire-headed monk's hiding of meat and fish.

Pure wisdom and pure thoughts. Unlock insights after eavesdropping: Punishment

6800321__.desc:
There was a famine in Huainan, many people died of hunger in Yangzhou and Yangzhou, and famines continued year after year. Many devout believers in Kaifeng went to the Daxiangguo Temple to pray for blessings in the hope that the disaster will be eliminated early, dry poplars will bloom, the weather will be smooth, the grain will be abundant, and a good year will come as soon as possible.

Li Tianyun. Unlock the information after talking to Shen Shi: Year of Disaster

6800327__.desc:
The chivalrous girl Qi Yuqin has withdrawn from the world in recent years, focusing on taking care of her daughter Xiao Taozi, but she doesn't want the people from Gui Fanlou to kidnap Xiao Taozi without her warning. Not long ago, Qi Yuqin finally rescued her daughter and vowed to make the culprit pay the price one day.

Fang Chengtian, Fang Shanlin, and Ma Dazhuang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Ghost Fan Tower

6800332__.desc:
Two young men gathered in front of the Yulong Manyan and whispered. It turned out that these two people participated in the construction of the Yulong Manyan, and the Yulong Manyan in Wazi was not the real Yulong Manyan. They seemed to have built it for a list. The real Yulong Manyan had been lost long ago.

Liang Sa and Kuang Anping. Unlocking insights after eavesdropping: Yulongmanyan

6800334__.desc:
Look at the sandy place at the ferry, how many people are crossing the world. Everyone knows the name of Bianshui River, but no one knows the bones under the mud. The now prosperous city of Kaifeng has also experienced the baptism of war countless times.

Liang Jing. Unlock the information after talking to Youshi: Bianshui

6800337__.desc:
Wei Zi, the King of Flowers, came from Wei Renpu Mansion. When this flower first appeared, people who wanted to see the flowers had to pay dozens of coins to board a boat and cross the pond to the flower place. However, Xianggong Wei had always been quiet and frugal, but he didn't know what the money was used for.

Ning Xixi. Unlock the information after talking during the day: Wei Zi

6800341__.desc:
There was a well-known storyteller in Kaifeng Prefecture, named Qianqiu Gongzi. However, because this person liked to end his books with tragedy, people also called him "Qianqiu Gongzi".

Chi Xiaonan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Mr. Qianqiu Part 1

6800347__.desc:
Qi Tianyuan from the Thirteenth Floor got acquainted with Jiang Yishui from the Tianjing Ferry Pier. Jiang Yishui came from Baigongfang and seemed to be ordered by a young master to bring news to Qi Tianyuan. Maybe the Thirteenth Floor also had his own secrets.

Qi Tianyuan. Disguise yourself as Jiang Yishui (by the river) and after talking to him, you will unlock the information: Thirteen Rooms

6800348__.desc:
Xianqiao Teahouse is an old shop in Wazili. The owner, Mrs. Zhou, is a strange woman and stipulates that the teahouse only accepts female customers. There are rumors that Mrs. Zhou will get sick when she meets men, but rumors are just rumors after all, and no one has ever seen Mrs. Zhou actually get sick.

Kingly man. Unlock the information after the conversation: Xianqiao Tea House

6800349__.desc:
Jiuliu Sect disciples Wang Lezheng and Han Qingyang were stationed at the oil umbrella station in Wazinei, observing the actions of the Khitan envoys in Huaixin Station every day. Wang Lezheng was bored, while Han Qingyang was full of motivation and thought his work was quite meaningful.

Wang Lezheng, Han Qingyang. Unlocked after the conversation: Insights: Surveillance

6800351__.desc:
The imperial court built Baigongfang. Wang Xiaotu, an apprentice at the carpentry shop, was very excited when he heard about it. He asked his master Wang Xiuzhu whether they would move to Baigongfang, but his master poured cold water on it.

Wang Xiuzhu, Wang Xiaotu. Insights on unlocking after eavesdropping: Bai Gongfang

6800354__.desc:
Chen Sheng came from Shezhou, and Jin Kui, the owner of Nanshi Restaurant, asked him about the current situation in Jiangnan. Although there was no war in the south of the Yangtze River, there was a serious money shortage, so iron money was issued as a last resort. However, the Central Plains did not recognize iron money, and the business of many travelers from the south was affected.

Chen Sheng. Unlock the information after talking to Sishi: Money shortage

6800356__.desc:
A few days ago, the Wuyou Gang took the waterway directly to Xinghan, robbed many passers-by's belongings, knocked over several river lanterns, and caused a small fire. Sun She from the perfume shop went to see Yulong Manyan that day, and also suffered a terrible disaster.

Zhang Jinghuai. Unlock the information after talking to Xu Shi: Leaking the water

6800358__.desc:
Many people were affected by the imperial court's ban on iron money, and those small shops with no financial resources had to close down long ago. Some sensible merchants know that long-term pain is worse than short-term pain, and the temporary pain is better than the long-term harm of iron money.

Sun Yongan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Iron Money

6800359__.desc:
Young Master Qianqiu Shen Miaoqian is a woman, and few people know about this. Shen Miaoqian received a lot of letters in the past two days, most of which were ridiculous and helpless.

Wan Jingming and Shen Miaoqian. Unlock the information after the conversation: Mr. Qianqiu·Part 2

6800363__.desc:
When troupe member Yi Xiaowu was packing up props and clothes, a gaudy and colorful monster jumped out of Huaixin Station. The monster had horns on its head and was extremely fast. Judging from Yi Xiaowu's description, he might have seen a Khitan shaman.

Yi Xiaowu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Encountering a ghost during the day

6800408__.desc:
Master Huiming in Xiu Lane worships Buddha at home all day long, not to pray for blessings, but to atone for her sins. For relatives, for friends, and for the people of the world. The friend in her words is none other than Liu Anran, and Liu Anran's "crime" seems to involve an past event.

Master Huiming. Disguise yourself as an umbrella shop at noon and talk to Liu Anran to unlock the information: Atonement

6800987__.desc:
Wu Shisanniang from Wubi Inn found out that recently, the Jiuliumen and Zuihuayin sects had been secretly cooperating with the purpose of seizing something from the Liao people, but they didn't know what the reason was for the two sects to choose to cooperate. Wu Desi seems to be planning to sit back and watch this matter.

Wu Shisanniang. Uncovering the information after eavesdropping in Haishi: Similar desires converge

6800989__.desc:
The Incomparable Inn indeed has a secret. Yi Shuyun, a disciple of Guyun, discovered that many spaces in Wubi Inn were hidden, and the shopkeeper didn't look like an ordinary person. He probably had some skills on his side.

Yi Shuyun. Unlock the information after the conversation: Wubi Inn

6801018__.desc:
The thief Yan Shuang'er broke into Room No. 1 of Wude Si Tianzi at night. According to her, Wude Si's treasure is hidden here. In other words, the real owner of Wubi Inn is Wude Si. But it seems...she was tricked by her senior brother Kong Konger.

Yan Shuang'er. Unlock the information after the conversation in the guest room on the third floor of Zishi: The Thief Ye Yan

6801047__.desc:
The abandoned small building in Siwei Garden is called Lanke Building. One of its walls is dedicated to poems, and many people’s calligraphy has been left behind. This building originally belonged to Ruixiang Garden. After the establishment of the Song Dynasty, the officials heard about the origin of Ruixiang Garden and changed it to "Siwei Garden". They demolished the useless and extravagant things in the garden and returned most of the land to the people. The land once occupied by the park has returned to the hands of the people in another way, and the area near the immortal tree has gradually become a place for hundreds of residents to play.

All bright. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Siwei Garden·Part 2

6900017__.desc:
Wu Desi has been active recently, exploring the situation within the Forbidden Army to prevent conspiracy and disruption. Although it was mainly aimed at the generals on guard duty in front of the palace, the three military compartments in the east of the city belonged to the imperial army and were also the targets of Wude Division's investigation. People within the Forbidden Army were panicking.

Liu Baiyu, Wu Zhong. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Takeshi

6900022__.desc:
There lived an arrogant poet in the corner gate, who used the suffering of the people as a source of inspiration.

Zhang Daxian. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Arrogant Poet

6900088__.desc:
There lived a man named Li Datou in Jiaomen. He was once the son of a landlord. However, during the class turmoil during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms, he lost everything and lived in Jiaomen, living a desolate life.

Li Datou. Unlock the information after the conversation: Son of the Landlord

6900285__.desc:
Before Lord Hong Si appeared, Wuyou Cave was just a gathering place for a group of extremely vicious people. They occupy this place, but each is their own king, like a ball of scattered sand.

Morning thirty, morning four-one. Unlocking the information after eavesdropping: Hongsi rectifies the Wuyou Gang

6900290__.desc:
A few days ago, the Taoist master of Jiuliu Sect broke into the den of thieves of the Wuyou Gang. The people in Jiaomen are all waiting for the Taoist Master to rescue them.

Zhu Xiaozhi, Jing Tiantian. Unlocking the information after eavesdropping: Jiuliumen attacks the Wuyou Gang

6900296__.desc:
According to the neighbors in Jiaomen, Wen Ying and her grandma have lived here for several years. The two depend on each other and have a very good relationship

Ye Xian. Unlock the information after the conversation: Yingying and Grandma

6900302__.desc:
The government's violent collection of money has made things worse for the already poor people in Jiaomen. People's lives are miserable.

Lou Xiaoying. Unlock the information after the conversation: Inside the Poverty Corner Gate

6900309__.desc:
The people who come to Kaifeng from other places to make a living have their own bitter stories behind them. In order to save some money, they would rather live in a dilapidated corner gate.

Chen Xianyu. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Discussing life

6900319__.desc:
There is a place called Ghost Fan Tower in Wuyou Cave, where the singing, dancing and fine wine are all excellent. But without the token, you can't enter the gate of Guifan Tower.

Fang Chengtian, Fang Shanlin, and Ma Dazhuang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Ghost Fan Tower

6900322__.desc:
Jiaomenli was originally part of Baifang, but it was destroyed by the Khitan siege more than ten years ago.

Hong Zhizhi. Unlock the information after the conversation: The History of Jiaomenli

6900338__.desc:
The Taoist master of Gui Shizi is a monster with three heads and six arms, and is said to have terrifying fighting power.

Wujiang River. Unlock the information after the conversation: Taoist Master

6900359__.desc:
The Wuyou Gang occupies the underground area of ​​​​Jiaomenli. In the past, people from the government would come here to pay taxes. However, the underground terrain is complex, and officers and soldiers suffer numerous casualties every time they come to clear the enemy. Gradually they gave up their jurisdiction over the area.

Lao Yu. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Official attitude

6900371__.desc:
Underneath Jiaomenli, there is also the station of Jiuliumen. Many Jianghu people and businessmen covet the ghost market and official wealth shop below.

Zhu Rui, Chen Xianglan. Unlocking experience after eavesdropping: Gui Shizi

6900534__.desc:
Deep in the Wuyou Cave, there is a mysterious trading place. I heard there are many ghost slaves inside.

Wu Feng, Zhang Qian. Unlock the information after eavesdropping: the mysterious trading place

6900705__.desc:
Obtained from talking to Qi Wuyu
Insights·Fan Tower Scenery
Zuihuayin is famous for its twelve scenes among flowers. Some people think that each of the twelve scenes has its own charm, but others think that Fan Tower ranks first among them. Not only is the "goddess pouring wine and flying fairies dancing and playing music" unique and charming, but the "bead curtains with embroidered foreheads and octagonal halls" also seem to echo some of the scenery of the prosperous Tang Dynasty.

6900726__.desc:
Talk to Zhuo Yulin on the first floor of Fan Tower
Insights·Romance in the prosperous Tang Dynasty
Zuihuayin comes from Guangling, Jiangnan. The identity of the original founder is a mystery, but it is rumored that she was probably the sworn sister of Empress Liezu. Her origins and her relationship with Jiangnan Kingdom may be important reasons why Zui Huayin can interpret the romance of the Tang Dynasty.

6900779__.desc:
Although both are famous for singing and dancing, Liyuan advocates pure and elegant music, emphasizing on sticking to one's heart and abandoning glitz. Therefore, Master Liyuan usually does not allow his disciples to enter the Fan Tower. Violators may be severely punished.

Ye Zhiqiu and Xu Lijun are on the first floor. Unlock the information after the conversation: Liyuan Zhixing

6900826__.desc:
Talk to Ji Shuiyun on the third floor of Fan Tower
Insights·Fan Lou plaque
The phrase "The flowery moon and the spring breeze" on the plaque in the middle of the Fan Tower are exactly the handwriting of Mr. Nanzhu. It is said that this is also proof of the deep friendship between the young master and the master of Fan Tower.

6900850__.desc:
The products in Zuihuayinhong's sales shop are highly sought after by wealthy businessmen, and top-notch products often trigger panic buying across the city. Some people saw business opportunities and started the business of purchasing goods on behalf of others.

Yu Hui, Li Pan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Red Sales Purchasing Agency

6900866__.desc:
Using river lanterns to find the right person is a long-standing entertainment in Zuihuayin. Write your thoughts and wishes on a piece of paper, put it in a river lantern, and wait quietly, maybe you will meet a destined person and receive a reply from afar.

Yue Lanfang. Unlock the information after the conversation: River Lantern Connection

6900897__.desc:
Just talk to Si Zhounuan
Seeing and hearing·Qunfang comes out of Xiu
Qunfangtie is the necessary identification to participate in the gathering of heroes. It is said that "when all the beauties come out, all the heroes will take their seats." This is Zuihuayin's consistent rule.

6900921__.desc:
The top contestants in Tanchunfang will have the opportunity to perform in Fanlou. The selection there is even more difficult. As many famous actors come out from there, there are just as many people who pretend to be fake and the building collapses in an instant, and they have no money from now on.

Huo Tinglan, Mu Huaishan. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Fang Fei chooses again

6900935__.desc:
In the Zhuohua Hall, starting from the master, there are two disciples, Bai Yaoyao and Bai Zhenzhen. It is said that both of them have supernatural powers. Yaoyao can create a thousand-mile love relationship with a piece of Taoyao post. Zhen Zhen, on the other hand, has clairvoyance and can see the other person’s life deeds and lifelong marriage.

Bai Zhenzhen. After the conversation, you will unlock the information: Attendant of Burning Flower.

6900961__.desc:
Chunshui Pavilion in Zuihuayin is deeply loved by Tianquan disciples in Northeast China. From the day it opened its doors to welcome guests, it has been crowded with Tianquan disciples and has almost become an unofficial Kaifeng Tianquan branch.

Gao Ning. Unlock the information after the conversation: Tianquan Branch

6901039__.desc:
Every few days, Zuihuayin holds a fireworks display at night. Rich people and relatives in Kaifeng love to celebrate important events by naming them. During this period, guests from all over the world came together, and there were countless red envelopes and wine banquets, creating a gorgeous and prosperous scene under the spectacular fireworks.

Zhao Rui, Sun Jinyuan. After the conversation, you will unlock the information: Fireworks Festival

6901055__.desc:
Fanhuaju is not only the living place for Zuihuayin disciples, but also their rehearsal room. You can get first-hand information on all kinds of news including the Heroes Meeting here. Therefore, from time to time, media outlets come to inquire about information, but for some unknown reason, this information is almost never leaked.

Power and strategy. After talking to Zi Shi, you will unlock the information: Flowery Residence

6901094__.desc:
Different from the luxury, wealth, splendor and bustle of Fan Tower, Yunhua Tower is located in a corner, quiet, elegant, tranquil and leisurely, which is very popular among literati.

Ge Nanxing, Wenxiu. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Literary Interests

6901117__.desc:
The owner of Fan Tower has a matching fan named "Boundless Wind and Moon". It is said that it is something that can only be used by the leader of the flowers in Zuihuayin. When it is opened, it is like a hundred flowers blooming, and it is like a wind and moon that is boundless and unparalleled in the world!

Mulberry Luyun, Shen Ling. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Endless Love

6901146__.desc:
Tao Yao Tie is Zhuohua Pavilion's unique way of attracting people. People in the museum will find a match for the person based on his temperament, preferences and self-recommendations written on the post. However, this is only about fate, not destiny. Whether this fate is deep or shallow, good or bad, ultimately depends on the intention of the person seeking fate.

Bai Yaoyao. Unlock the information after the conversation: Tao Yao’s quest for fate

6901149__.desc:
The previous owner of Yanle Square, Han Wei, and Jiang Yi were once known as the two most powerful musicians in the world. The two often held piano discussions in the square and by the lake, and left many masterpieces. Unfortunately, on the night of the Chenqiao Mutiny two years ago, Han Wei died suddenly. And this too coincidental timing also left some unexplainable conjectures for future generations.

Dong Lanting is on the first floor. Unlock the information after the conversation: Han Wei’s legacy

6901232__.desc:
Opening a forum every quarter to review the music scores, and hanging the best ones at a high place in the square, was a custom established by Han Wei, the previous owner of Yanle Square, who imitated the Lunar New Year appraisal in the Eastern Han Dynasty. His disciple Ling Yuming took over and followed the good customs. After several years, it took several years to achieve the full-court fragrance in the square today.

Kong Shan, on the first floor. Unlock the information after the conversation: Qu Le Liu Fang

6901452__.desc:
There are many Shu people near Yuyi Tower, and it is said that they came to Kaifeng with the Shu prince. The Prince of Shu came to pay his salary, and ostensibly negotiated with the Northern Song Dynasty court about the extradition of the Twelve Immortals back to Shu, but he was also secretly hunting down the Twelve Immortals.

Xiang Baian. Unlock the information after eavesdropping: Visitors from Shu Kingdom

7000562__.desc:
There was soft singing and graceful dancing in Yuyi Tower. The waitress at Yuyi Tower said that all the music in the building was composed by Zuihua Yinjiang Yi, and the dances were even composed by Empress Dazhou herself. There seems to be an extraordinary relationship between the two.

Division Thirteen. Unlock the information after the conversation: Yuyilou·Part 2

7000580__.desc:
Talk to Tai Xuan. Thirty years ago, there was a tomb robbery case in Kaifeng. The tomb robbers dug up Zheng's tomb. It is said that the gambling saint of Kaifeng once dealt with the tomb robber Mo Jinxiaowei and got a fine dagger from that man.

Tai Xuan. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Stealing but not seeing the stolen goods · Part 2

7000593__.desc:
The imperial court demolished Xifang and rebuilt Baigongfang, and compensated each household with a certain amount of money. During the demolition last year, someone in Xifang conspired to embezzle the demolition fee of "madman" Ding Pu.

Dyer. Insights unlocked after eavesdropping: Demolition fees

7000597__.desc:
Many people in Xifang know about Ding Pu. It is said that Ding Pu’s wife had a dystocia when giving birth to Ding Muer and died very early. At Mrs. Ding Pu’s funeral, an unexpected person appeared - Kaifeng Gambling Saint.

Lady Yuan and Grandma Duan. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Old things in Xifang·Part 3

7000607__.desc:
Thirty years ago, near the Zheng Family Courtyard, a pregnant lady was hit by someone. The person who hit her was the criminal who was involved in the famous Zheng Family Tomb theft case. The doctor said that the lady later gave birth to a smart baby girl.

Zheng Zhonglin. Unlock the information after the conversation: Touching the Gold Captain·Part 3

7000612__.desc:
A hundred years ago, Mrs. Zheng passed away, and the Zheng family held a grand funeral. The cemetery is in the southwest of Kaifeng City. There are rumors in Kaifeng city that there are rare treasures among the funerary objects of Mrs. Zheng, which are envied by the people. But the treasure that was once rumored to be sealed in the tomb now appears in the Strange Objects Prison.

Shao Qing. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Xingyang Zheng Family·Part 2

7000620__.desc:
A strange incident is recorded in the Xifang files. A gambling sage from Kaifeng was once caught by the government in Xifang, but the stolen goods turned out to be a bunch of children's toys.

He Zhi. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Stealing but not seeing the stolen goods·Part 3

7000629__.desc:
In August of the third year of Qianfu, Wang Xianzhi invaded Henan and defeated eight counties in ten days. When the news reached Kaifeng, the second son of the Zheng family evacuated Fengcheng with his family members, and everyone in Xifang Courtyard also moved away. Later, a man named Zheng Mao came back occasionally to worship his ancestors. But fifteen years ago, Zheng Miao also disappeared and never appeared again.

Dou said. Insights on unlocking after eavesdropping: Xingyang Zhengshi·Part 3

7000633__.desc:
A shop owner in Linheli has been running a teahouse for decades, and he always remembers the two customers who took the wrong packages. The reason for remembering it is very simple. One of them is a young gambling sage from Kaifeng, and the other side is Ding Pu and his wife. At that time, Ding Pu’s wife was still pregnant with Liujia.

Lu Jingzong. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Old things in Xifang·Part 1

7000634__.desc:
The theft of Zheng's tomb thirty years ago caused quite a stir. The tomb robber was very unlucky back then. Not only did he bump into the real owner of the tomb, but he also accidentally sneaked into the deserted Zheng family's courtyard after escaping to Xifang, and bumped into the Zheng family's children who were chasing him.

catch fast. Unlocking information after eavesdropping: Touching the Golden Colonel · Part 2

7000640__.desc:
When chatting with others, Lu Xi, a junior at the tea house, mentioned that thirty years ago, a pregnant lady was hit by a thief. Thanks to the son of the Zheng family, she was sent to the hospital.

Lu Xi. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Old things in Xifang·Part 2

7000693__.desc:
The tomb robber's notes record that a branch of the Zheng family of Xingyang, a wealthy family, was buried near Kaifeng. Thirty years ago, a senior known as the "Captain Touching Gold" caused quite a stir in the tomb.

Grave robber. Unlocking the story after eavesdropping in Xu Shi: Touching the Gold Captain · Part 1

7000696__.desc:
People in Xifang said that two years ago, a secret room was discovered underground in the Zheng family courtyard in Xifang, which contained a batch of treasures buried a hundred years ago. Therefore, the imperial court built a rare objects prison on the spot to collect the treasures.

Chai Fang. After the conversation, you will unlock the information: Supervisor of Strange Objects.

7000699__.desc:
There used to be a villa of the Zheng family in Xingyang in Xifang. Today, the Zheng family's land is used for the building and rare objects room.

Jing Yu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Xingyang Zheng Family 1

7100295__.desc:
Kaifeng Gambling Saint got acquainted with Taoist Master Zhu Yousheng before Jiuliumen was established, and a lot of stolen goods passed through the hands of Gambling Saint and flowed into Gui Shizi. This man was so bold that he dared to commit crimes when he was being chased. Yet this man actually gained the admiration of many disciples of the Nine-Liu Sect.

Le Ming. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Stealing but not seeing the stolen goods · Part 1

7100297__.desc:
The coffin, which should have been plain, was painted a joyful bright red. It looks like the heroine surnamed Zhang who has returned from Yannan is sleeping. It looks like a disciple named Wan who was once astonishingly talented and beautiful in the Jiuliu Sect is lying on his back.

All bets are off. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: The Coffin

7100300__.desc:
The unknown grave commemorates the unknown people in history. Some people say that the people buried in the tomb are martyrs who died in the battle; some say that they are the survivors of Yanyun who would rather die than surrender; others say that they are just refugees who fled to their deaths.

When you are young, follow Wanshixiu around here or stay for a while to unlock the information: Tomb of the Unknown

7100317__.desc:
A secret report from Kaifeng Prefecture revealed that there was a detailed work coming from the north. Someone with knowledge of the matter said that this person might be the miraculous "He Bo".

Yan Xiaoliu. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Beibei Seizaku

7100323__.desc:
Baimayiyicheng has nothing to do with the white horse "Lingxue", and he has the beauty of Yannan, which is thousands of miles away. But after returning from the north, everything stopped and the horse was no longer galloping. There was nothing left here to regret the neighing of the horse.

An Suoji. Unlock the information after talking to Zi Shi: Yi Cheng’s White Horse

7100324__.desc:
A few days ago, the boatmen here carried an extremely heavy coffin, which weighed two people.

Triggered by eavesdropping on Wang Sanshui's conversation at night.

7100333__.desc: A Ji and A Nian were born in Yannan, and came to Baimayi eight years ago after being rescued by Wan Shixiu. Aji was so young when he left home that he could barely remember what his family looked like. He only remembered that the torches in the hands of the Khitan people destroyed their hometown, which they could not return to.

7100443__.desc: According to Bai Kong'er, the money-cutting man of Baimayi, the reason why business has been booming in recent days is due to the turmoil in Khitan in the north.

7100445__.desc:
From the mouth of Luo Xiaoxiang, a tea doctor at Longmen Teahouse in the north of the city, news came that He Bo was about to return. I don’t know if it’s the real news from Sekiryudo, or a smoke bomb to confuse the enemy’s lover.

Qiu San. Unlock the information after the dialogue: The Return of He Bo·Part 1

7100446__.desc:
There was once a woman in black who looked at the Jinming Pond in Wansheng Town. She said bluntly that it was like a gluttonous monster, eating insatiably. Today, it is delivering food every day. When the day comes, it will be the life of all the people. Some people say that they once saw a woman in black knocking on the door of the residence of Moshan Dao disciple Que.

Feng Yan. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Woman in Black

7100447__.desc:
Wansheng Town is an important water transportation town on the Bianhe River and is occupied by Qingjiaotang. In recent years, as the Zhao and Song dynasties actively prepared for war and developed naval forces, Wansheng Town used the equipment left over from Moshan Road to process military rations and prospered.

Fan Fan. After talking to him who came back to resist the army rations, you will unlock the information: the army rations town

7100451__.desc:
The citizens of Wansheng Town, led by Qingjiaotang, are all hard-working and simple, and will "volunteer" to do more during their daily work. Although the income has not increased due to this extra effort, at least the job will not be ruined due to inactivity.

Yu Xian. Unlock the information after talking to Zi Shi: It’s a waste of effort

7100455__.desc:
There is a master of Moshan Dao in the Longjiao Gang, who is the master of mechanism "que". All hydraulic equipment in the Longjiao Gang are his handiwork. Qingsu has a good relationship with the leader of Chilongtang. Since the Longjiao Gang split, Quesu has stopped coming to Qingjiaotang. Nearly three years have passed, but the turning equipment at the gate is still running as usual. There is no need for maintenance at all, which is a miracle work.

Mo Shuilu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Bird

7100457__.desc:
Many of the hungry people who came to Qingjiao Hall were desperate people. However, according to the old rules of the Longjiao Gang, all those who join the gang, regardless of high or low, are brothers in the world. Bangxia Qingjiaotang is no exception.

Wang Qingsheng. Unlock the information after the conversation: Brothers from the Four Seas

7100459__.desc:
Wansheng Town is as prosperous as it is today, all because Qingjiaotang surrendered to the Song Dynasty court. Although the Longjiao Gang had enmity with the Song Dynasty court, if they put down their dignity and regard the past as garbage, wouldn't it be a sudden change in the future?

Zhang Sheng and Wang Yidao. Unlock the information after the conversation: The bent Qingjiao Hall

7100461__.desc:
"North of the Yellow River, south of Yanyun, on the edge of the Song Dynasty, on the soil of Khitan." News from Kuanglan revealed where He Bo went north. But the reason why he went north was worth ten thousand jars of Shenxiandu wine.

Li Baihui. Unlock the information after the dialogue: The Return of He Bo·Part 2

7100465__.desc:
What everyone in the Longjiao Gang misses most is a bowl of hot spicy soup. Rumor has it that the pinnacle of Hu spicy soup comes from He Bo's bowl of fish soup, which is also the favorite of Zhu Yu, the former leader of the Longjiao Clan, Feng Ruzhi, the leader of the Red Dragon Hall, and the leader of the Qingjiao Clan.

A lot of Zhang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Hu spicy soup

7100485__.desc: A few days ago, a noble man secretly went to Fuxi Mountain. I don't know why. It may be related to the chaos in the Xuanyuan Sect these days.

7100690__.desc:
In the wilds to the east of the city, strange cold bacteria suddenly appeared. If anyone touches them, they will get chills.

Li Minzhi. Unlock the information after the conversation: Strange Cold Bacteria

7100771__.desc:
What the painter Dong Danqing regards as a treasure is the color material specially customized for the Wu Temple murals. But there are no murals on the four walls of the Wu Temple. The murals mentioned by the Twelve Immortals' cloth strips are unknown...

While doing the Unjust Event [Twelve Immortals], explore the dye vat here and unlock the information: Martial Temple Color Materials.
It can also be unlocked by talking to the nearby dyehouse worker here.

7100776__.desc:
One of the seven sufferings from heaven. If you want to recruit the cheapest workers, go to Tianlaidu. Industrial workers are cheap and simple, so they are the best candidates for work.

Shopkeeper Huo. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Seven kinds of suffering come from heaven, hard work is cheap

7100778__.desc:
One of the seven sufferings from heaven. Cheap wine mixed with water is best sold, with a clear price tag for a penny per bottle. It's just that for such a fine wine, I don't know whether it tastes like water in the wine or tastes like wine in the water...

Jiu Liu Niang. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Seven Bitternesses from Heaven·Drinking into Sorrow

7100779__.desc:
One of the seven sufferings from heaven. In the ferry from the sky, the smelly salted fish is the best to sell, because it is very cheap, only 20% of the original price. Some people even say that the smell of salty fish is very similar to the smell of the missing Longjiao Gang leader and current Hebo Boss Feng, which has the effect of seeing things and thinking about others...

Sister-in-law Fish. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Seven Sufferings from Heaven·Salted Fish Turns Back

7100781__.desc:
In just two years, the situation in heaven has changed. For some reason, Feng Yi and Zhu Yu, the talkers of the Longjiao Gang, disappeared.

Su Ming. Unlocked after dialogue: Insights: Borderlands

7100783__.desc:
In the past, people's ancestors found fertile land by the Yellow River and lived and worked in peace and contentment. People believed that everything was born with their own hands, not a gift from the gods. The sky is jealous of the prosperity of the world and is afraid of the collapse of faith, so it rains heavily. Heavy rain fell, the Yellow River burst, and the floods surged into the sky. People had no choice but to beg for mercy from the gods in the sky, but there was no reply... In the heavy rain, someone stood up, and that was the first "He Bo" of the Yellow River.

Granny Pan, Hu Zi. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Secrets of the Longjiao Gang·Legend of Hebo

7100784__.desc:
Cao Xie, a disciple of the Nine-Liu Sect, regards deceiving the rich as his career. After succeeding in Tianquan several times, he earned a certain amount of money and wanted to live freely in the world. However, he was touched by the sufferings of the people from heaven. Recalling his childhood, he actually squandered all his family wealth here. He was afraid of being laughed at by his brothers, so he euphemistically called it "long-term investment".

Cao Xie. After the dialogue, you will unlock the information: Seven sufferings come from heaven, and you must suffer the consequences.

7100787__.desc:
Longjiao Clan Rules: Anyone who joins the Clan will wear it with a Nuo face. Green is the green dragon, red is the red dragon. Those who are not members of the gang should not be admired, but there are exceptions: those who have made great contributions to their gang and are regarded as close friends by He Bo can also be admired.

Nuo Lao. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Secrets of Longjiao Gang·Nuo Mian

7100795__.desc:
General Rong in Jinmingchi has the ability to build a five-toothed ship, and he often takes the wooden kite as his trust. For some reason, General Rong's wooden kite appeared in Miss Que's house.

Cui Xiaolian. Unlock the information after the conversation: Secrets of the Longjiao Gang·Xiao Muyuan

7100799__.desc:
A disaster two years ago caused misfortune to Mrs. Aguo's family. Her husband passed away and Mrs. Aguo also lost the ability to stand up in this disaster. At a young age, A Cai and Guo'er shouldered everything with faltering steps.

Mrs. Aguo. After the dialogue, you will unlock the information: Seven Sufferings from Heaven, Standing in a Cone without Land

7100800__.desc:
The flood two years ago was the real culprit from heaven for our current situation. But according to the people from heaven, behind the natural disasters, there are also unknown "man-made disasters" hidden.

Li Ya. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Seven Sufferings from Heaven·Natural and Man-made Disasters

7100801__.desc:
The beggars in Kaifeng City, if they can get dozens of coins, they always like to come to Tianlai Ferry to experience the feeling of being rich and being regarded as the God of Wealth.

Beggar Zhang. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Secrets of the Longjiao Gang·Beggar God of Wealth

7100804__.desc:
When crossing the northeast, there are bandits who are plundering rampantly. Among them, all the bandits are defectors from the Longjiao Gang. Gang leader Zhu has passed away, Boss Feng has disappeared, the Longjiao Gang has split, and the group is leaderless. No one cares about the gangsters here.

Uncle Ah Shui. After the dialogue, you will unlock the information: Secrets of the Longjiao Gang and Robbery on the Road.

7100805__.desc:
There are four "gold treasures" in Jiuliumen. These are the treasures of the sect. It is said that they were left by Zhu Hai, the ancestor of the Zhu family during the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period. If you get them, you can realize the great truth. Fifteen years ago, there was a strange man in the world who collected four of them, and after enlightenment, he was named the "Dung Master" of Kaifeng. It seems that someone in the sky has seen this treasure...

Shi Jinquan. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Secrets of the Longjiao Gang·Dung Master Jinbao

7100820__.desc:
The shopkeeper of Hongxiu Zhao Restaurant, Hong Sanniang, brews excellent wine and has won the reputation of "Red Sleeves Add Fragrance" among the merchants. But after the depression came to the sky, things and people in this place also changed, leaving only sick children and widowed mothers.

Huang Dalang. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Secrets of the Longjiao Gang·Red Sleeves Add Fragrance

7100821__.desc:
In order to tide over the difficulties, Tianshang came to Chilongtang to carry out a centralized food supply system so that everyone could have a sip of thin porridge.

Jiang Xiong. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Secrets of Longjiao Gang·Souping

7100923__.desc:
There are many shops in Kaifeng city that only recruit workers under the age of thirty-five.

Wang Shunzi. Unlock the information after the conversation with Chenshi: Seven Sufferings from Heaven·Thirty-five Years of Unemployment

7100927__.desc:
According to the servants of the Martial Temple, after the military power was released over a glass of wine, many generals who retired with General Shi often visited the Martial Temple and talked about the Northern Expedition.

Zhang Xiaowu. Insights unlocked after eavesdropping: Meeting in the Martial Temple

7200112__.desc:
In order to prepare for the war, Zhao Song ignored the truth about the blood feud twelve years ago and directly transferred the plains to the people of Cheng'en Town. This move made the Zheng clan very disappointed with Zhao Song.

Zheng Zonghua. Unlocking the information after eavesdropping: collecting food for payment

7200119__.desc:
In the past few years, Village Chief Xie seemed to go out a lot, often going to Da'an Village, and sometimes going to Shanting to sit alone. A few days ago, he went to Changpingcang. My wife always felt that Village Chief Xie was hiding something from her.

Wang Fang. Unlocked information after talking to Wei Shi: The homeless person

7200126__.desc:
Village Chief Xie likes to tell stories to his little daughter. These stories have happy endings and teach three principles: good deeds and evil deeds are rewarded, mistakes can be corrected, and mutual help.

Xie Lanzhi. Unlock the information after the lunch conversation: the story of coaxing a child

7200130__.desc:
As the Autumn Society Day approaches, the harvest festival in Chengen Town is very lively, and many villagers are making preparations there.

Sun Qiqi. Unlock the information after the conversation: Autumn Society Day

7200163__.desc:
Xie Yuanting, the mayor of Cheng'en Town, and He Yuezhi, the sword leader of He Daozhai, were once brothers who worshiped each other. However, the two eventually parted ways for unknown reasons.

Wang Zhenzhen. Unlock the information after the dialogue: The brother who worships you

7200213__.desc:
In the face of an epidemic that many talented and talented senior doctors could not eradicate, Zheng Zhaixu, a disciple of Qingxi and the doctor of the Imperial Medical Office, knew that his talents were limited, but he always worked tirelessly and entrusted his long-cherished wish of peace and benefit to future generations and the future.

Zhai Xi. Unlock the information after the conversation with Chenshi: Peaceful Wishes

7200295__.desc:
Zhai Chun is the manager of Lingxingcun medicinal materials processing workshop. He has stepped forward to shoulder important responsibilities during several natural and man-made disasters. Everyone praised her and respected her, but they gradually forgot that her perseverance and dignity today were all tempered by suffering.

Zhai Chun. Unlock the information after the conversation: Baicao Guanshi

7200306__.desc:
Since last year, Lingxing Village, under the leadership of Song Yu and Zhai Xu, has been studying the "meat-introducing method" of poria cocos cultivation based on Qingxi hand scrolls.

Shu Shu. After talking to her wandering around, you will unlock the information: Yinrou Fuling

7200401__.desc:
After the Yellow River receded, a very fertile land was left in the north of Lingxing Village. Zhai Jing, a villager in Lingxing Village, led the people to develop melon and fruit cultivation here. The cold melons harvested were very popular among the nobles in the north of the city.

Zhai quinoa. Unlock the information after the conversation: Seize the beach for planting

7200404__.desc:
Recently, a distinguished person in Jianlong Temple went up to the mountain and asked the immortal in the temple to prepare a "Chen Zhen Ceremony Fight" for him. This noble dragon has its head but not its tail, and few Taoist priests in the temple have seen its true appearance.

Dao Ling. Unlock the information after the conversation: Asama Reito

7200406__.desc:
In the recent "Chaozhen Ritual Fight", it is necessary to recite the "Beidou Sutra". The Lord of the Big Dipper is the cardinal of creation, the master of humans and gods, and can eliminate disasters and overcome disasters.

Blessing. Unlock knowledge after dialogue: Beidou Sutra

7200407__.desc:
It is said that Taoist Tan from the south of the Yangtze River has Taoist medical skills, and his talisman water can cure all diseases. Some people also saw that Taoist Tan secretly sprinkled medicinal powder into the talisman water...

Wang Yaoniang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Fu Shui

7200411__.desc:
Years of war have caused Kaifeng Temple to flourish. People who do not believe in God will kowtow and pray for even a glimmer of hope.

Guo Yuanwai. Unlock the information after the conversation: Do not believe in God

7200415__.desc:
It is widely rumored that throwing money into the spring eyes of Jianlongguan to make wishes is very effective. Only the Taoist priests in the temple suffered from headaches because the copper coins blocked the well water eyes.

Daosu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Make a wish

7200417__.desc:
According to Dao Xian, at midnight, the Xuanyuan Sect appeared in Sanqing Hall. When several senior brothers went to investigate afterwards, there was no trace of the Xuanyuan Sect.

Taoism. Unlock the information after talking to Shen Shi: The disappeared Xuanyuan Sect

7200429__.desc:
The things refined by Taoists are said to have the effect of prolonging life. However, there are also many Taoist priests who refine the golden elixir that explodes... It is very powerful when it explodes, and it may have other uses.

Tongyu. Unlock the information after the conversation: The magical effect of golden elixir

7200460__.desc:
When the flood started two years ago, several Taoist priests went down the mountain to find relief. However, it was difficult for manpower to disobey God's will, so some Taoists practiced astronomy hard in order to turn things around.

Daoyin. Unlock the information after the conversation: Road up and down the mountain

7200462__.desc:
Recently, there have been many Xuanyuan sects near Jianlong Temple, or nobles coming to worship on the mountain.

Miao Xun. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Evil Trace of Xuanyuan

7200518__.desc:
The young master who went up the mountain with Ma Shao lost his trace for some reason. This young master was dressed in white and was called "Jin Zhongyuan".

Ma Shao. Unlock the information after the conversation: Missing Mr. Jin

7200519__.desc:
In the morning he was a farmhouse man, and in the evening he ascended to the Emperor's Hall. Everyone has the desire to learn. With the influence of the academy and the growing literary style in Kaifeng, the gatekeepers also have the desire to learn.

Qi Wei. Unlock the knowledge after the dialogue in Xu Shi: The Heart of Learning

7200532__.desc:
Mrs. Wang of the Fu family often dreamed of her husband being injured during the Northern Expedition, so she only hoped that her son would put down his thoughts of wielding swords and guns and stay in Kaifeng to be an idle husband and live a happy and peaceful life.

Lady Wang. Unlock the information after talking to Youshi: The Idle Man

7200534__.desc:
Qingjiao Tangtang advocated Wrong's private residence. No idlers were allowed to enter, but it was only open to literati. This was the reason why Hall Master Zhang liked to chat with literati the most. According to unknown sources, Hall Master Zhang has recruited a group of literati and seems to be compiling and restoring a long-lost martial arts secret book...

Liu Xiaohe. Unlock information after dialogue: except scholar

7200536__.desc:
There is a rumor in the world that Longjiao helped Master Zhang of Qingjiao Hall recruit scholars to spell out a lost magical skill from the Yellow River. But he didn't expect that this magical power was from an ancient book - "Shuibu Shi", a water conservancy work in the Tang Dynasty. As the saying goes: The great cause of water control will last for a long time.

Zhang Sheng. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Ancient Books of Sanyi

7200661__.desc:
When Xu Tangchang supported the merchants in Ganqian and Bianluo, he saw Jinshi walking around, and he went out and sighed: "This is how you should give birth to a child." The chaos in the later Tang Dynasty was all due to the military power of those who controlled the world. The prosperity of the Zhao and Song Dynasties may be different. The reason for the current dynasty is the country of Japan.

Xu Tang. Unlock the information after the conversation: This is how you should give birth to a child

7200678__.desc:
Liu Feibao and his wife are very loving, but they have always been taboo about mentioning his past name in front of his wife.

Wang Bingjie. Unlock the information after the conversation: Old things and old names

7200684__.desc:
Sun Yue thought of selling her daughter because there was no food at home.

Sun Yue. Unlock the information after the conversation with Chenshi: Selling food and buying people

7200700__.desc:
Zhong Mo suspected that the villagers of Cheng'en Town had tampered with their fields, causing disaster in their fields, and told everyone he met his suspicions.

Zhong Mo. After the dialogue, you can unlock the knowledge: Containing evil intentions

7200707__.desc:
The package that Grandma Yang brought to worship the land contained the best food in her family. She firmly believed that if she offered the best food to the land, she would definitely get the best reward. The more calamitous the year, the best food would always be in front of the gods.

Grandma Yang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Land Blessing

7200751__.desc:
Zhou Xi is a well-known lazy guy from all over the country, but his younger brother Zhou Yue is extremely tolerant of him, which Zhang Jiqiang doesn't understand very much.

Zhou Yue. Unlock the information after the conversation: Born to be lazy

7200788__.desc:
The Zhao brothers went to Kaifeng to look for their distant relative Zhao Ya and returned home for the funeral, but there was no news about the person they were looking for. Zhao Xiaokai somewhat suspected that Zhao Ya had had an accident.

Zhao Xiaokai. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Looking for relatives is nowhere to be found

7901202__.desc:
The collection of Tang Dynasty money in Kaifeng City caused turmoil. Many Kaifeng people left the city to seek a way to survive. The houses in the city were vacant and the shops closed down.

Sun smiled. Unlock the information after the conversation: It’s hard to laugh today

8000332__.desc:
Feng Sandao, who pretended to be looking for the sachet, turned out to be the Inspector of Wude in disguise. The case of the Shi family's private soldiers may have gone to heaven.

Seal three swords. After eavesdropping, you can unlock the information: Private Soldier Inspection.
--Know everything beforehand [The bird is gone and the bow is hidden], and you must wait for the NPC to reach the position in the picture without exposing yourself.

8000337__.desc:
The two famous mouthmen in Kaifeng both rely on their iron mouth to travel around the world. "Poluo Zuier" is famous for his scolding, while "Tie Zuisheng" is known as "the whole body is iron-tongued and tough." The two were not sworn enemies at first. After getting this strange book, they studied it together, but unexpectedly they began to cherish each other.

Wang Tiezui and Fang Babei. After the two talk to each other separately (you can just pass by and listen to what they have to say), you will unlock the information: "Poluozuier" and "Tiezuisheng"

8000342__.desc:
Liu Zhiran, a disciple of the Wenjin Hall, was well-read in classics and history and had great literary talents. However, he always spoke so boringly during lectures that his students fell asleep and woke up as if they had "amnesia." Therefore, his disciples nicknamed him "Liu Amnesia" and later, for some unknown reason, became known as "Liu Shiyi."

Liu Zhiran. Unlock the information after the conversation: Liu Shiyi

8000361__.desc:
Su Bu, a disciple of Wenjin Hall, was born in Kuaiji, Wuyue. His family had a tradition of litigants for several generations. Su Bu had been exposed to the tradition of litigants since he was a child, and he was good at writing complaints. Every time he finished writing, his pen became bald, so he was nicknamed "Master Bald Pen".

Su Bu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Mr. Bald Bi

8000362__.desc:
The Zhu Yu Decoction drank by the people outside the city was originally the "Ginseng Lotus Intermittent Decoction" in Qingxi Gate. When the Khitan invaded, Zhu Yu worked hard to save the people in the city and removed all the expensive and precious medicines in the prescription. Instead, they used the common medicinal materials. The effect was even better.

Cheng Miao, Lian Xin. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Planting dogwood all over Part 3

8000371__.desc:
