The Imperial Medical Office is the official office in charge of medicine all over the world. It has the title of Feng Yu and several officials from the Hanlin Medical Clinic. Its copies are not open to the common people. This is because when the Khitan invaded, Zhu Yu, a disciple of Qingxi, and several benevolent doctors hung pots to help the people and relieve the victims. During the founding of the Zhou Dynasty, this tradition was extended to promote the medical style.

Wind and waves. Unlock the information after the conversation: Imperial Medical Office

8000376__.desc:
The Zhuyu Pavilion, also known as the "Zhu Yu Pavilion", is said to have been built by Emperor Shizong to commemorate the meaning of the Zhuyu Hanging Pot. It was named because of the Zhu Yu Pavilion planted beside the pavilion. Qingxi disciples often planted Zhu Yu Pavilion under the pavilion to commemorate it.

Forsythia. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Planting Dogwood · Part 1

8000514__.desc:
The wife of the Wang family in the north of the city suddenly suffered from a heart attack, and all the doctors in the city were helpless. Only Dr. An Ziliang of the Imperial Medical Office could alleviate the disease. Everyone in the city knew that Dr. An had rejuvenated her with his wonderful skills, but only Mrs. Wang knew that her heart ailment was caused by lovesickness.

An Ziliang, Wang Liuyue. Unlock the information after the conversation: Lovesickness

8000523__.desc:
The "Xie Zhi" is engraved on the screen wall of Kaifeng Mansion. It is said that it was set up by Wang Pu when the former dynasty rebuilt Kaifeng Mansion. He intended to use this mythical animal to show justice in the world. There is also a rumor that originated from unknown sources. It is said that Wang Xianggong has a Xie Zhi in his carriage, and he can judge the case impartially, so that no prisoner will die unjustly in the prison.

Wei Zheng. Unlock the information after the conversation: Haizhi

8000571__.desc:
There is a Zhaoxue Tianting Drum in front of the Kaifeng Mansion. It is said that it was set up by King Pu of Shizong of the previous dynasty. If the people have suffered great injustice, they can beat the drum to cry out their grievances and go up to heaven to hear it. However, those who beat the drum will be beaten to show their ambition. In the past three years, only one person has played this drum. It is said that the drum he played has been "abandoned" on the mountainside of Fuxi...

Zhang Zhen. Unlock the information after the conversation: Zhaoxue Tianting

8000575__.desc:
The main entrance to the backyard of Kaifeng Mansion cannot be passed except by Lord Fu Yin and His Majesty. There are rumors in the world that this gate is called Dragon Gate, and only the real dragon emperor can pass there.

Stop for a moment, listen to the low-pitched beep of the Yamen servant, and then trigger the information: Mr. Fu Yin can pass.

8000586__.desc:
There are rumors in the world that a bride recently died in vain because of her unfaithful husband, and the ghost of the wronged woman haunted her widow. She left a pair of embroidered shoes and a letter in blood to make the unfaithful person pay for her life.

Wang Chengjin. After the dialogue (choose "Don't die!"), unlock the information: Ghost Bride Part 1·Embroidered Shoes

8000587__.desc:
Captain Lin was fined for three months because of his inability to solve the case. If you want to exchange the corpse within the mansion, there must be an informant in Kaifeng Mansion to help.

Lin Zhiyuan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Ghost Bride Part 3·Informant

8000593__.desc:
The location of Kaifeng Fuyin's residence is very strange. It is adjacent to the prison to the west and the prison to the east. There are rumors that this is a situation of "using good to suppress evil". There are also rumors in the rivers and lakes that the house contains a treasure left by the former Kaifeng Prefecture Yin Wang Pu, so it is kept secret.

Insights unlocked after eavesdropping at noon: Evil prevails over good

8000599__.desc:
Recently, the masters who "came to Suzhou to study" and "Tongwenyi Xue" wanted to use the Hanlin venue to set up mock exams for children's subjects. Many children in the city studied hard for this purpose.

Liang Shengshu. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Kaifeng Same Trial

8000705__.desc:
It is rumored that there are six strange people in the Kaifeng Mansion. Although they are in the Jianghu, they are recruited by the Kaifeng Mansion to handle difficult cases. They are: Liu Baiyu, the "white jade is flawless", Gu Huanyuan, who "talks nonsense", Zhang Cuo, who "continues right and wrong", Tang Jingchou, who "severely punishes but does not lend money", Zhuge Jing, who "stands still", and Shi Gu, who is "half dead".

Zhang Dayuan, Ma San. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Liubu Yamen

8000734__.desc:
Foreign envoys came to visit the Song Dynasty, and Yiluan Si was ordered to organize a banquet with Zhao Pu. However, because of the incompatibility between the military generals and the civil servants, the Yiluan Division was worried about this.

Zhang Sheng, Chen Qi. Unlocking the story after eavesdropping: The storm is surging

8000756__.desc:
According to rumors, there is a folk team in Shouchangfang called "Birds, Beasts, Insects and Fish" who go around doing chivalry and justice. There are many people in the street who are counting on the members of the team to come forward and punish the lawless Fourth Young Master of Jinjie.

Lost. Unlock the information after the conversation: Birds, beasts, insects, fish

8000760__.desc:
It is said that Xianningfang has been very uneasy recently. A few days ago, another Hu merchant disappeared in Dongliyuan.

Zhang Chengyuan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Inn situation

8000772__.desc:
For some unknown reason, none of Hu Shang's companions who went missing reported the case and seemed unwilling to make it public.

Chen Xiaochen. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Mystery of Hu Shang

8000786__.desc:
It is said that the missing foreign businessman in Dongliyuan is actually a foreign spy. He took advantage of the civil and military struggle in Kaifeng to steal Kaifeng city defense plans.

Ye Wangcai. Unlock the information after the conversation: Take advantage of the opportunity

8000788__.desc:
According to the craftsmen in the Ordnance Supervision, the technicians here disappeared because they were involved in civil and military struggles.

Du Xiaochuan. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Unexpected disaster (be careful to avoid inspection by officers and soldiers)

8000804__.desc:
A talented technician from the Ordnance Supervisor has been missing for many days. The Ordnance Supervisor has reported it to Kaifeng Mansion, but there are currently no clues about the case.

Fan Yuanling. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Worry of the Weapons Supervisor

8000813__.desc:
The civil servants headed by Zhao Pu suspected that the assassin who assassinated Zhao Pu that night was a military general, and the generals in the introduction department had harbored them.

He Yi, Secretary Changqing. Unlocking insights after eavesdropping: Assassin’s aftermath

8000821__.desc:
His friend reported that he had been missing for many days, and He Panshan was worried about this.

Ho Pan Mountain. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Mystery of the Technician

8000851__.desc:
It is said that many years ago, there was a master thief named Star Picker, who was very skilled in light martial arts, robbed the rich and gave to the poor, and was highly respected by the people.

Chen San. Unlock the information after the conversation: You can pick up the stars with your hands

8000958__.desc:
After the incident of releasing military power over a glass of wine, civilian officials took over, military generals lost power, and the conflict between the two parties intensified.

Chen Jingrong, Eavesdropping Unlocked: Civil and Military Fights.
--Prerequisite: Complete All Things Know-[Chi Yu Lin Mu]

8001101__.desc:
The male prisoner in the prison kept crying and howling. Listening carefully to his voice, it turned out that due to some strange combination of circumstances, his dead wife who had been killed by her husband came back to life, while the male prisoner who was wrongly convicted was unwilling to leave the cell for some reason.

Zhao Dayan, Wang Anning. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Ghost Bride Part 2·Killing Wife

8001104__.desc:
Wen Jin Guan claimed to be the Wen Zong of the world. Although he did not enter the temple, he took it as his own responsibility to preach and receive teachings. He opened schools, gave lectures, and tutored countless people.

Wen Zi Jing. Unlock knowledge after dialogue: Preaching and Teaching

8001105__.desc:
Madam Wang, who lives in the Wang residence, has recently suffered from heart disease, and all the doctors in Kaifeng City are helpless. Madam Wang said that the disease can only be relieved by An Hanlin's prescription from the Imperial Medical Office...

Moon and stars. Insights unlocked after eavesdropping at noon: Heart disease is difficult to cure

8001255__.desc:
Dr. Liang Conglu of the Imperial Medical Office was famous for his "Golden Needle Diagnosis", which he specialized in treating internal injuries of martial artists.

Chen Zhaoyu, Shen Bao, Shen Yangshu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Jin Zhendu

8001262__.desc:
With the wheat fields of Pingyeyuan, the water transportation of Linjin Ferry, and the support of the government, Chengen Wheat Store has developed extremely rapidly in the past two years, and is now the largest wheat store in Kaifeng.

Zhao Xiusui. Unlock the information after the conversation: Chengen Maihang

8001274__.desc:
Due to the imperial grain harvest, famine in the south of the Yangtze River, and the lack of harvest in Pingye Plains this year, the price of wheat at Cheng'en Wheat Company has continued to rise, which has brought a considerable burden to merchants and people.

Li Junwei. Unlock information after the conversation: Rising wheat prices

8001307__.desc:
According to a helper at Cheng'en Wheat Shop, when you are short of money, you can try your luck at the black market in the city, and you might be able to buy cheap grain—or high-quality grain from Pingye Plains! But at a time when food prices are rising across the city, the origin of this wheat is a bit questionable.

Granny Shen, Ge Shun. Unlock the information after the conversation: Cheap food on the black market

8001347__.desc:
Relatives and friends of He Yuexing, the head of Mohang, seem to have an old grudge against Chengen Town. Many years later, He Yuexing no longer wanted to mention the past, but it was obvious that those old friends were unwilling to let him go.

He Yuexing, Dou Min. Uncovering insights after eavesdropping: The owner of Mo Xing

8001393__.desc:
Facing the tragic situation of famine in the south of the Yangtze River, Shen Yilun, the Minister of Household Affairs and Changping envoy, wrote a petition, hoping that the counties could loan their military grain reserves to civilians. Unfortunately, the proposal was temporarily rejected by the court.

Yao Yan. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Chang Ping Shen Jun’s letter

8001396__.desc:
Compared with the price of wheat, the price increase of rice in Maixiangji is even more exaggerated. Due to the tight supply caused by the famine in Jiangnan, the price of rice has more than doubled.

Feng Yu. Unlock information after the conversation: Skyrocketing rice prices

8001404__.desc:
After Changping envoy Shen Yilun submitted a memorial to lend grain to the people, he was suddenly assassinated on his way back to Kaifeng from Jiangnan. He is still recovering from his injuries at Qiu Mingju near Changpingcang. Who exactly carried out this murder? This sudden assassination makes people dare not think deeply.

Ye Liang. Unlock the story after the conversation: The assassination of Shen Jun in Changping

8001466__.desc:
Zheng Youan, the owner of Maixiangji Zhengjia Fried Cake, is indeed a descendant of the Zheng family in Kaifeng, with five surnames and seven hopes, but for him, the illustrious glory of his ancestors has long since disappeared with the changes of the times. I just don’t know why some villagers in Chengen Town have been entangled with him over this past incident.

Zheng Youan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Kaifeng Zheng Family

8001513__.desc:
Many pedestrians greet and say goodbye at the Yangliu Pavilion outside the south gate of Kaifeng. Therefore, some flower girls gather here to solicit business.

Ge Ruofei. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Flower Girl of Yangliuting

8001552__.desc:
The red flag camp at Linjin Ferry was led by Wang Haizhou. The squeeze and price cut by You Haobo and others made their lives extremely difficult. But out of gratitude for You Haomiao's kindness, they still tried their best to endure.

The pool is clean. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Imjin Red Flag

8001556__.desc:
Since the Linjin Ferry was jointly run by the imperial court and Chengen Town, and most of the goods transported back and forth were grain, the ferry had always been operated by Chengen Town, and many of the people involved in the cargo trade were from here.

Wu Zhigang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Chengen Cargo Store

8001565__.desc:
A few years ago, Zhou Lijuan, a girl from a wealthy family in Kaifeng, fell in love at first sight with Li Meng from Chengen Town, and the two got married. However, Li Meng has no other merits except a handsome face. As a result, their marriage gradually came to a point where they were separated and broke up.

Zhou Lijuan. Unlock the information after the conversation: The hairpin breaks the mirror

8001596__.desc:
The donkey cart business at Linjin Ferry has chaotic charges and is mostly run by eloquent brokers. It is easy for people who are new to Kaifeng to be fooled.

Wang Hu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Donkey Cart Business

8100194__.desc:
In the third year of Jianlong's reign, there was a famine in Huainan. There were many deaths from starvation in Yangzhou, Shandong and other states.

Li Ding. Unlocked after dialogue: Famine in the South

8100207__.desc:
Anjiyuan behind the Huimin Bureau is a place where doctors temporarily treat poor and critically ill patients. Doctors take the benefit of the people as their original intention and provide the people with the help they can.

Akishino. Unlock the information after the conversation: Anji Yangmin

8100294__.desc:
Rehmannia glutinosa, yam, chrysanthemum and other medicinal materials of Heji Bureau come from Lingxing Village in the north. The medicinal materials there are not only of high quality, but also reasonably priced.

Deng Yuan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Listening to Xing’s Good Medicine

8100301__.desc:
There are rumors in the world that the secret treasure in the Hidden Mist Forest can make people immune to all poisons, bring people back to life, and make them immortal. Qingxi, Wuxingu, and Xiujinlou have been fighting for it for many years, and this has attracted countless people from all walks of life to come here, just to get a piece of the pie.

Bu Jingqiu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Strange Treasures in the Mist Forest

8100358__.desc:
The notice booth in Changxingji is filled with numerous recruitment orders related to treasure hunting in the foggy forest. It's just that these recruitment orders are mixed between true and false, so in order to find the real masters of martial arts, you must carefully screen them.

Yuhang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Treasure Hunt Recruitment

8100370__.desc:
The vendors at Changxingji near Zhenbao Pavilion are all good at telling stories. It's a pity that the items sold in these shops are 10% fake and 10% genuine and they refuse to return or exchange them.

Fu Bing and Wu Tianming. Unlock insights after listening: True and False Changxing

8500487__.desc:
Due to a dispute over the pricing of medicinal materials, the Lin brothers opened two drug stores with similar names in Changxingji to fight against each other. Regular customers generally call them "DaLin Pharmacy" and "XiaoLin Pharmacy" to distinguish them.

Yuan Li. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Repaying kindness with gratitude

9100181__.desc:
The villagers of Lingxing Village were able to settle down and live here with the help of Qingxi and other doctors. In order to thank them for their help, the two sisters, Fu Ling and Fu Xuan, and the villagers jointly established Futian Yuan to help others after the incident, and made a promise of "one life, one price, one porridge, one night; the same day and night, and never change customs."

Fuling. Unlock the information after the conversation: Qingxi Promise

9100324__.desc:
Zhai Qiu is the talker of Lingxingcun Pharmacy. With a fierce nature, her heart has always been in the world, and she only stopped for the sake of her relatives, friends and hometown. However, although the world is far away and her dreams are not broken, she is still full of expectations for the future.

Zhai Qiao. Unlock the information after talking to Youshi on a sunny day: The manager of the pharmacy

9100329__.desc:
Linjin Duhuo Co., Ltd. is headed by Liu Feihu from Chengen Town. He was very envious of his brother and sister-in-law's simple and happy life. Working hard, he married Lu Yufang from Yinzi Shop and brought home a life where his wife and children lived on the hot bed.

Liu Feihu. Unlock the information after the conversation: The owner of the goods store

9100333__.desc:
There are two owners of Linjin Dujiao shop. My sister Lu Yufang is good at making fragrant drinks. Liu Feihu, who works at the store next door, admires her for her gentleness, thoughtfulness and sweetness.

Lu Yufang. Unlock the information after the conversation: The second boss of Imjin Dujiao Store

9100416__.desc:
There are two owners of Linjin Dujiao shop. My sister Lu Guifang is good at making glutinous rice noodles. She has a generous and enthusiastic nature. Although she has experienced various hardships such as running away from home and losing her husband, she has always lived an optimistic and strong life.

Lu Guifang. Unlock the information after the conversation: The big boss of Imjin Dujiao Store

9100418__.desc:
All doctors at Huimin and the Pharmacy Bureau are required to take the monthly examination of the Imperial Medical Office. So every time before the exam, many people would study hard all night in the backyard library.

Wang Guangyou. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Medical Clinic Monthly Examination.

9400124__.desc:
Wang Guangyou is the head doctor of Heji Bureau. Every day, he will carefully check the prescriptions for difficult and complicated diseases issued by the Huimin Bureau, and fill the prescriptions after confirming that they are correct. He tried his best to reduce the possibility of misdiagnosis, because he saw the patients' joys and sorrows in his eyes.

Wang Guangyou. Unlock the information after talking to Zi Shi: Heji Anmin

9400193__.desc:
You learned from Gu Sange that Han Xiangxun once left his hometown for some reason, and later brought pear tree branches from his hometown to plant. Perhaps the name Liren Tears came from because Han Xiangxun was also a Liren.

Brother Gu. Appears when applying. Dialogue Unlocking Information: Lichou Farewell

9700239__.desc:
The wealthy businessman Wang in Kaifeng, although he was arrogant and did his own thing, he rarely showed any filial piety. Ever since Mrs. Wang was diagnosed with heart disease by Dr. Shang, Shopkeeper Wang wanted to spend all her family wealth to save her mother's life. But there seems to be something fishy here...

Tian Yunniang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Heart Disease

9700241__.desc:
Repairing the Gouzi embankment cost a lot of money, but Chilongtang's savings were already stretched thin and it was difficult to complete the embankment.

Shen Zhuer. Insights unlocked after the conversation: The gap is hard to fill.

9700245__.desc:
In order to cover the cost of repairing the Huzi Embankment and purchase 50,000 sandbags for flood fighting and rescue operations, Feng Ruzhi, the leader of Chilongtang, pawned all the dowry prepared by his parents for him.

Du Lian. Unlock the information after the conversation: The pawned dowry

9700249__.desc:
The former eldest lady of the Longjiao Gang, after the gang split, she single-handedly supported the Red Dragon Hall and was loved by the people.

Jiayu is prosperous. Unlock the information after the conversation: The eldest lady

9700253__.desc:
Que, a disciple of Moshan Dao, is the project supervisor of Gonggong Diao and Gouzi Jindi.

Shiliu'er. Unlock the information after the conversation: Bird

9700261__.desc:
Two years ago, Zhu Yu, the leader of the Longjiao Gang, died near Jindi in Gouzi.

Little crab. Unlock the information after the dialogue: The traces of Gang Leader Zhu

9700308__.desc:
Two years ago, there was a great flood, and many people died in the water and sea. After the flood receded, many people appeared under the Yubai River looking for corpses for burial.

Old Dingtou. Unlock the information after the conversation: Collecting Bones

9700312__.desc:
Recently, strange sounds have often been heard in Yubai River. There are rumors that this is the "dragon's roar", and there may be a rare treasure hidden under the water, attracting all the knights to come and search for the treasure.

Tian Heng. Unlock insights after eavesdropping: Strange noises

9700316__.desc:
According to legend, He Bo had a rare treasure in his hand, called the "Four Sea Treasure Baht". He had severely defeated the Khitan army fifteen years ago, and if he got it, he could control the wind and rain.

The night is still late. Unlock the information after the conversation: Si Hai Bao Baht

9700318__.desc:
According to the storyteller, He Bo had a bad life. He was infected with the poison of cold bacteria and suffered from the impending flood. At this time, there was actually a yellow bird behind him. As the saying goes: when the house leaks, it rains all night, and when the boat is late, it encounters a strong wind.

Half-finger fairy. Unlock the information after the conversation: The house leaked and it rained all night

9700322__.desc:
He Bo in the storytellers' mouths is ever-changing. He is good at martial arts, Qihuang, fan dancing, and heavy swords... Is there really such a person in the world?

Hua Tuan'er. Unlock the information after the conversation: He Bo?

9700328__.desc:
In Taogang on the outskirts of Ubo River, stall owner Banzhixian told everyone anecdotes about He Bo, but the beggar on the side didn't seem to take it seriously.

Beggar Xiaozhi. Unlocked after the conversation: Storyteller

9700335__.desc:
Just talk to the Taoist spirit on the roadside
Insights·Xuan Yuan’s Traces
Recently, there have been many elusive Xuanyuan Sect disciples in Fuxi Mountain, coming for unknown reasons.

9700348__.desc:
Fifteen years ago, the Khitan invaded, and the "Seven Swords of Taiqing" were ordered to go down the mountain to save the world. Those who are good at refining elixirs can rejuvenate themselves, and those who are highly skilled in martial arts can defeat prisoners and kill enemies. But it is: give up the magic of Lingxu, but seek to be worthy of the world.

Hu Yuniang. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Seven Swords of Taiqing

9700351__.desc:
Just talk to Mrs. Zhang under the big tree outside the Zhang family's old house.
Insights·Zhu Ranhongxiu
According to folk rumors, the Zhang family of Bolangsha has been harming the people for a long time. Fortunately, Zhu Yu, a disciple of Qingxi, took action and beheaded him before he was able to convince the public.

9700353__.desc:
Just talk to Liang Mengjin outside the Zhang family's old house.
Insights·Old friends here
A few years ago, four teenagers worked together to explore the old house of the Zhang family. In the meantime, the man in green turned out to be an orphan of the Zhang family. What he was looking for was just a thin letter and an answer. Suddenly, several years have passed, and the old house remains the same, with no more old friends coming back.

9700366__.desc:
The Heshi Le in the north of the city is a place for Goulan jokes. It has a very unique position to watch the opera. You need to go to the elegant seat of the flower boat on the river to watch it, which has a lot of flavor.

Lu Sheng. Unlock the information after the conversation: He Shi Le

9700379__.desc:
Guanyin is the number one signature of Heshi Music. It has a unique style of music and top-notch dance skills. However, the dragon appears but never ends. It is often protected by the Red Dragon Hall, but for some reason it has not appeared for a long time.

Su Daan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Breaking the Gong Guanyin

9700385__.desc:
The rude man who is busy with music in Heshi is a thug from Sekiryudo who went out to work due to financial difficulties. This job opportunity seems to have been matched by the eldest lady of Sekiryudo.

Big money. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Red Dragon Hall

9700399__.desc:
In the music of the river market, a young man came to admire the "Broken Gong Guanyin", but he couldn't see the beautiful lady. He wanted to buy flowers and fill the flower boat, waiting for the beautiful lady's return with a pomp of "full courtyard".

Feng Lanxiang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Man Tingfang

9700411__.desc:
Thanks to the shopkeeper of Di's store, Heshi Le's little song has a place to stay. Thanks to the fame of Po Luo Guanyin, Heshi Music has a foothold.

Little song. Unlock the information after the conversation: Dog Friend

9700420__.desc:
The sisters of the Shi family who run a bookstore originally lived in the city, but their family fell into ruin due to Mr. Shi's collection of money from the Tang Dynasty. Fortunately, they were rescued by "Broken Luo Guanyin" and were able to settle down outside the city.

Shi Cunqing. Unlock the information after the conversation: The Shi Family Sisters

9700428__.desc:
Rumors in the rivers and lakes and the creation of music in the rivers and lakes were inspired by Fan Lou. Some villagers saw that Fan Lou was making money every day, so they imitated him in acting. Although he was not glamorous, he was more than funny, and he became famous.

Yue Xiaobao. Unlock the information after the conversation: Dong Shi Xiaoqian

9700439__.desc:
All the actors in Heshi Le are quite extraordinary in their skills. They are not like a theater troupe that specializes in this art, but more like practitioners who have been practicing martial arts since childhood.

Pei Yuan'er. Unlock the information after talking to Xu Shi: Martial Arts Practice

9700450__.desc:
Are there ghosts and gods in the world? Some children actually said that they had seen two red and green ghosts throwing themselves into the well when the moon was dark and the wind was high. I wonder if this was true.

Mulberry flower. Unlock the information after the conversation: Red and Green Ghosts

9700452__.desc:
Qingxi Sect has a long-standing principle of "one life, one price". How to fulfill the contract only depends on one's heart. There are doctors who change lives with a thousand pieces of gold, and there are doctors who change lives of others with their own lives.

Lingquan. Unlock the information after the conversation: One life, one price

9700477__.desc:
Zhu Yu Decoction was originally made fifteen years ago when Zhu Yu was fighting Khitan. It tasted pungent and refreshing, so it had a refreshing effect. Since then, it has been imitated by many people and has become a trend.

Sister-in-law Wang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Dogwood Soup

9700487__.desc:
Li Jiutian, the bully of the Wuyou Gang, came to provoke Pan Xinniang because he seemed to be in love with her. As a native of Kaifeng, he didn't know when he learned the Khitan dialect.

Tian Erxiao. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Khitan dialect

9700494__.desc:
The Jianghu people who are silent during the day secretly listen to people in the corner at night. Not only can they hear the Khitan accent in their words, but upon closer inspection, they seem to be colluding with the Wuyou Gang...

Jia Sancai is in the inn during the day and on the roof at night. Unlocking insights after eavesdropping: The oriole is behind

9700587__.desc:
Fifteen years ago, Long Jiao helped Zhu Yu drive the Khitan to Fengqiu Village and hid the Khitan secret treasure here. As of today, it has become a legend.

Mo Xiaomi. Unlock the information after the conversation: Khitan Secret Treasure

9700590__.desc:
The stone for the statue was originally quarried for building the racket pole of Jinmingchi, but was later used for other purposes after the ship was repaired.

Ahu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Big Ship Shooting Rod

9700592__.desc:
The Mohist giant's tablet, which was once highly valued by the world, has been abandoned like a worn-out shoe by who knows who. The ideal of non-aggression and love, but I don’t know when it will be realized.

Zhu Liuer. Unlock the information after the conversation: Mozi’s Tablet

9700609__.desc:
It is very strange that there is a horse dealer in front of the restaurant. If you don't deal with it, you will not be able to buy horses.

Quan Yiren. Unlock the information after the conversation: The mysterious horse dealer

9800029__.desc:
In Fengqiu Village, I don't know who organized a competition to recruit brides, and the people taking part in the fun were resting on the roadside. The dogwood soup, which was originally in poor sales, became very popular in Kaifeng.

Yan Chu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Business Wizards

9800031__.desc:
Shedian used to be a place for garrison training. I heard that new weapons are being developed in the Shedian House.

No chapter left. Unlock the information after the conversation: Past of Shedian

9800033__.desc:
The banquet hall that was supposed to be under construction was now occupied by a group of Zuihuayin disciples for unknown reasons.

Wuyou. Unlock the information after the conversation: Banquet Hall

10100088__.desc:
In the past, only the royal family and officials could enter the imperial garden. In recent years, it has been opened to the common people for spring outings.

Wu two hundred. Unlock the information after the conversation: Yuyuan

10100089__.desc:
The farmland on the other side of the mountain is being infested by a strange disease. Although Chengen Town is having a good year this year, some Chengen Town villagers are still worried that the strange agricultural damage will spread.

Wu Meilian. Insights unlocked after eavesdropping at noon: Hidden worries in a good year

10100090__.desc:
Wang Lingyue's two brothers want to find her a son-in-law. They are currently more interested in Zhang Xukang, but Zhang Xukang seems to have gotten into some trouble recently.

Zhang Xiping. Unlocking the information after eavesdropping in Xu Shi: Recruiting a son-in-law

10100093__.desc:
Faced with the hidden concern of reduced food production, some villagers had the idea in advance of abandoning the elderly, weak, women and children to reduce food consumption. There seems to be a precedent for this kind of incident in Chengen Town.

Zhang Xiucai. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Abandoning wife and daughter

10100095__.desc:
Chengen Town has had a change of village chief once. The original village chief's surname was He. He was expelled by the villagers for some reasons, but he has been waiting for an opportunity to retaliate after being expelled.

Zhang Xiucai. Unlock the information after talking to Zi Shi: Change of village chief

10100096__.desc:
There have been some sneaky people in Cheng'en Town recently. The adults in the village seem to know why. The children are very dissatisfied with you for telling the children to ignore this matter.

Village child. Unlock the information after the dialogue: The bad guy at the entrance of the village

10100097__.desc:
Chang Pingshi, the steward of Changpingcang, is said to be from Chengen Town, but some villagers in the town seem to have had an unpleasant past with Chang Pingshi.

Yang Xing. Unlock the information after the conversation with Chenshi: Chang Ping Envoy

10100098__.desc:
Village Chief Xie seems to want to return part of the land to the people of Da'an Village, but the villagers have great objections to this, and the people of Da'an Village don't seem to be satisfied either.

Eavesdropping on villagers' conversations to unlock insights: Returning the Land

10100099__.desc:
Chen Tiezhu went out secretly some time ago, but his wife caught him red-handed. She kept pressing him for several nights and refused to let him go out. Who knew who had been waiting for him for several nights.

Chen Tiezhu. Unlock the information after the noon conversation: Private meeting at night

10100100__.desc:
Most of the boatmen on Linjin Ferry are from Bolangsha. However, due to internal conflicts within the Longjiao Gang, the boatmen here were also divided into two factions, and they were constantly at odds with each other.

Pan Hanning. Unlocked after the conversation: Ferry Boatman

10100124__.desc:
The Green Flag camp at Linjin Ferry was led by the You brothers. Compared to his gentle brother You Haomiao, his younger brother You Haobo is more radical and determined to drive out all the people from the sky.

You Haobo. Unlock the information after the conversation: Imjin Green Flag

10100125__.desc:
Fertilizer production from Xiaohe mud was originally a more common agricultural fertilizer production technology in the Jiangnan area. After being recorded on the Qingxi hand scroll, it was promoted in Lingxing Village after Zhai Xu’s study. With the help of mud and fertilizer, Qingxinpu, which was originally not fertile, ushered in a bumper harvest of medicinal materials, and the villagers gradually settled down.

Zhai Bo. Unlock the information after the conversation: Making fertilizer from clay

10100126__.desc:
The rehmannia seedlings and planting methods in Lingxing Village came from Qingxi. With the help of doctors, the villagers gradually planted large fields of rehmannia glutinosa.

Zhai Li. Unlock the information after the conversation: Qingxi Medicine Seed

10100128__.desc:
What happened in the Liuji Pavilion during the flood night two years ago remains a mystery to this day. Afterwards, Xiu Jinlou and other Jianghu forces occupied the ruins, making it impossible for the villagers to get to the bottom of it.

Fu Erbo. Unlock the information after the conversation: Six Diseases and Mysteries

10100130__.desc:
Some villagers whose food harvests were poor due to strange diseases plan to find another way out, and this other way out seems to be related to the past of Chengen Town.

Cheng Xiaojie, Liu Shou. You can gain insights after eavesdropping on Chenshi: find another way out

10100132__.desc:
The Taiping Academy in Lingxing Village is a free school and is presided over by Zhai Xu of the Imperial Medical Office. Regardless of their origin, children who are eager to learn can learn pharmacological knowledge here.

Zhai Sanniang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Taiping Academy

10100133__.desc:
The cooked rehmannia glutinosa in Lingxing Village needs to be steamed and dried for nine times. The quality is excellent and it is well received in the world.

Zhai Siniang. Unlock the information after the conversation: Rehmannia glutinosa preparation

10100135__.desc:
The Liuji Pavilion to the east of Lingxing Village was once the original site of the village. After the epidemic broke out eight years ago, the villagers moved here with the help of doctors.

Fu old man. Unlock the information after the conversation: Ling Xing’s original address

10100188__.desc:
The source of the disease is Sun Buqi, a poisonous doctor who is notorious in the world for his research on dream puppets.

Mulberry night. Unlock the information after the conversation: Source of Cold Bacteria

10100191__.desc:
The proprietress of Jiyulou, Chu Shiyiniang, is known as "the one who stops when it rains" in the world. No matter how loud the noise is caused by the visitor, as long as he enters this place, the clouds can stop the rain and the disputes can be cut off.

Shangyu. Unlock the information after the conversation: Stop when it rains

10100193__.desc:
People who are interested in going to the Hidden Mist Forest to hunt for treasures will often come to the tea stalls in Changxingji to inquire about information. It's just up to everyone to find out what the news is and whether the news is true or false.

Changfeng. Unlock the information after the conversation: Tea Stall Secrets

10100199__.desc:
The owner of Changxing Jiji Weapon Shop's heart is not beating, and Gui Shizi's unblinking eyes are a pair of notorious brothers. After the news of the secret treasure hidden in the Hidden Mist Forest spread throughout the world, he moved his shop here in a heartbeat in order to use the Jianghu people who came to die to test his sword.

Chaihe, Shizhen. Unlock insights after listening in: Jianghu Trial Knife

10100283__.desc:
The Huimin Bureau is managed by Wang Congyun, a doctor from the Imperial Medical Office. It insists on selling medicines and providing diagnosis and treatment at affordable prices, and is well received among the people.

Yan Sanniang. Unlock the information after the dialogue: Benefiting the People

11300191__.desc:
When Zhang Tiemeng was pursuing Chen Tongrou, he learned to weave flower and grass wreaths to make her happy. Years later, he still retained this habit.

Zhang Tiemeng. After the conversation, you will unlock the information: Husband and wife friendship.
--Know everything beforehand [Crop Talk]

12200017__.desc:
You come across Kuanglan knights secretly drinking in Qufang. You recall what Uncle Jiang said in the past. Kuanglan knights are usually the most addicted to alcohol. Even the way they test their disciples is mostly related to alcohol.

One cup at a time. Dialogue Unlock Information: Alcoholic Frenzy

1000170363__.desc:
Recently, in order to supply food to Jinmingchi, Qingjiao Hall has been short of manpower and has often gone to the city to recruit workers.

Lu Lang. Insights from unlocking after eavesdropping: Manpower shortage

1000170367__.desc:
There are traces of traces left in the deserted house. Judging from the appearance of the traces, it seems that a fierce fight took place here, and some people were even injured.

Exploring the traces on the ground can provide you with information: traces of fighting

1000170372__.desc:
There are several books in the deserted village medical center, and the contents recorded in these books are all strange and weird.

Exploring the books on the second floor, you can get information: Weird medical books

1000170454__.desc:
Chu Wuming once had a benefactor who saved his life. Chu Qingquan, Chu Daxia, this person's name is enough for Chu Wuming to remember him for a lifetime.

Chu Wuming. You can only talk to you when you need it, and unlock the knowledge: Paying homage to the benefactor

1000170455__.desc:
The villagers usually put the dustpan on the roof, and when the pear blossoms fall, they naturally fall into the dustpan on the roof. Every year during the Zuixian month, the villagers would take off the pear blossoms and brew them into sweet tears of separation.

Explore the roof and unlock insights: Flying flowers reach the top

1000170456__.desc:
A group of guests with southern accents came to Shenxiandu, and Song Wuzheng was proud of the unprecedented grand occasion of Zuixianyue.

Song Wu. You can gain insights by talking before burning the village (you can make up for the mistakes through friends online after burning the village): Southern accent.

1000170460__.desc:
Yuansheng discovered an incredible treasure, but you discovered that this treasure seemed to come from a Tianquan disciple, and that Tianquan disciple seemed to have passed away not long ago.

Yuan Sheng's baby. Gain knowledge after picking it up: Treasure Secret Treasure

1008615245__.desc:
On the wedding night, the villagers who went crazy due to petrified disease attacked each other. After that, the villagers stopped marrying outsiders. Only when they were no longer in this world would they tie up a thatched bride to comfort themselves.

Exploring the book behind The Thatched Bride will reveal information: The Thatched Bride. and clue shop

1630210195__.desc:
Rong Zhishui, the owner of Changxing Jizhenbao Pavilion, looks weak and weak, but in fact he has unique vision and ruthless moves. It is said that he has a close relationship with the owner of Gui Shizi's stolen goods. No matter how hot the red goods or black goods in the hands of the customers are, this boss Rong can eat them.

Rong Zhishui. Unlock the information after the conversation: Treasure sold as stolen goods

1630210199__.desc:
It is said that Thousand Buddha Village was once a prosperous Buddhist village, but its beliefs were heretical. During the Xiande period, after Qianfo Village was destroyed, officials took it as an example and erected a monument to warn the world.

Observe the stone tablet and unlock the knowledge: Imprisoned by Buddha.

1630230550__.desc:
A few years ago, a piece of extraterrestrial flint accidentally landed in Qianfo Village, triggering a long-lasting fire that burned the entire village to ashes. People around said that this was the retribution of Thousand Buddha Village.

Observe the stone to unlock insights: Catastrophe of Skyfire.

1631302047__.desc:
In April of the first year of Qianyou, a man named Zheng Mao once forged a Tang sword at the old blacksmith in Xifang. The name of the sword was "Judging Crime".

Old ledger. Unlock the information after investigation: One of the Zheng’s children

1631302048__.desc:
In the fourth year of his fortune, the Khitans invaded. Zheng Miao was rescued by a teenage girl, but the girl remained on the battlefield forever.

Zheng Miao's note. Unlock the information after investigation: The Zheng family's children·Part 2

1631502387__.desc:
After the Khitan destroyed hundreds of buildings, an ancient tree was left behind. Most of it was withered and blackened, but one branch sprouted new buds. The people thought it was magical and called it the tree of immortality. After Liu Zhiyuan stole Bianzhou and made it the capital of the Later Han Dynasty, Bianzhou officials forced the people to move away from the area where the immortal tree was located. They decorated the withered branches with oil paper flowers and built an "Auspicious Garden" around it to congratulate the Later Han Dynasty for their eternal prosperity.

Immortal tree. Unlock the information after investigation: Siwei Garden·Part 1

1631502388__.desc:
At the beginning of the Ding Dynasty, the Khitans invaded Tokyo, burned, killed and looted, causing countless casualties. There are hundreds of squares in South Street, where the knights and the people are united to fight against the Khitan. More than a month later, the Lord of Liao was defeated and the people rebuilt the city. They were surprised to see that the old tree in the northwest had survived the fire and sprouted new buds on its withered body. They thought it was miraculous and it was called an immortal tree.

Liu Zhiyuan established the Han Dynasty and proclaimed himself emperor, seized Tokyo, and used the immortal tree as an auspicious sign. He forcibly expelled the nearby people, decorated the burnt branches with oil paper and hundreds of flowers, and built an auspicious garden. It was dedicated to the Han emperor to wish the king a long and prosperous future. However, if Liu Han was killed in his second generation, how could he achieve the merits of a hundred generations? If we sincerely know that the rise and fall of a dynasty does not depend on good or bad things, how can a king in troubled times dare to do whatever he wants out of fear?

At the beginning of the New Song Dynasty, the world was divided, and the sentiment of the whole country was no better than that of the previous Han Dynasty. When the emperor heard about the old story of Ruixiang Garden, he took it as a warning and ordered the garden to be rebuilt. It was renamed as "Thinking of Danger" to return it to the people, with the intention of diligently cultivating virtuous government, thinking of danger and being cautious, and protecting the country and the people.

Xinwei was established in the seventh month of the first year of Jianlong



Stone tablet. Unlock insights after investigation

1631502389__.desc:
The "Thousand-Character Classic", "Nine Chapters of Arithmetic" and other contents are written messily on the loess ground. It can be seen that the residents of Baifang were rich and poor. Many people could not afford paper and ink, so they could only write on the ground. Later, the more they learned, the ground was scratched into shapes and the handwriting became increasingly unclear.

Scratches on the ground. Unlock insights after exploration: Come to Sumeng to learn

1632212632__.desc:
In the third year of Qianyou's reign, Zheng Mao went north to Qinghe. Since then, there has been no news. The former second son of the Zheng family may have completely disappeared.

Miscellaneous notes on forging leisure. Unlock the information after investigation: The Zheng family’s children·Part 3

1632212633__.desc:
On the first floor of the Imperial Medical Office is an ancient folding fan. Among the landscape paintings on the fan remain traces of blood and the inscription of Zhu Yu, a disciple of Qingxi.

Folding fan (second floor). Unlock the information after exploration: Planting dogwood everywhere·Part 2

PC_KOL_100491849.desc: Eavesdrop on the conversation between Yang Yao and Shan Qiuzhi to gain insights.

PC_KOL_100491852.desc: Eavesdrop on the conversation between Song Ying and Guan Zhouxing to gain insights.

PC_KOL_100491864.desc: You need to complete the mission Huigu·Final Chapter first and talk to Li Donglai and Chen Qi during the day to obtain it.

PC_KOL_100491870.desc: You need to complete the mission Huigu·Final Chapter first and then talk to Wang Erhua and Mengli to obtain it.

PC_KOL_100491873.desc: Obtained by eavesdropping on the conversation between Xu Da and Ren Mao

PC_KOL_100491875.desc: You can get it after the NPC conversation is completed.

PC_KOL_100491884.desc: You can get it by talking to Cai Yang and Cai Xiaocai

PC_KOL_100491885.desc: You can get it by talking to Shi Ali

PC_KOL_105291847.desc: During the day, eavesdrop on the conversation between Wang Yu and Yi Shezuo to gain insights.

PC_KOL_105291851.desc: Talk to Gao Jingxing at night to get information

PC_KOL_105291868.desc: You need to complete the mission Huigu·Final Chapter first and then talk to Jin Hetu during the day to obtain it.

PC_KOL_105291874.desc: You can get it after the NPC conversation is completed.

PC_KOL_105291879.desc: You can get it by eavesdropping on the conversation between Chu Da and Chu Er.

PC_KOL_105291880.desc: You need to complete the mission Huigu·Final Chapter first and then talk to Xigou'er to obtain it.

PC_KOL_105291882.desc: You need to complete the mission Huigu·The Final Chapter and then talk to Cai Dashi to obtain it.

PC_KOL_136301766.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Yu Fengbin next to the boundary monument at the entrance of the mountain in Chenshi-Youshizhong.

PC_KOL_136301768.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Lu Jianan next to the boundary monument at the entrance to the mountain in Chenshi-Youshizhong.

PC_KOL_136301769.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Cai Youli in the upper right corner of the boundary monument at the entrance to the mountain at Chenshi-Youshi.

PC_KOL_136301772.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Chen Mao on the south side of the Baixuan Bridge boundary monument.

PC_KOL_136301775.desc: Find two passers-by on the middle floor of Jumo Terrace and hear their conversation to unlock the information.

PC_KOL_136301776.desc: In Shenshi-Youshi, talk to Lin Ergu to unlock it.

PC_KOL_136301780.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Xiao Pan on the higher platform on the south side of the Yimofang boundary monument between Wu and Shen hours.

PC_KOL_136301782.desc: Triggered by talking to Wang Pao between Chen Shi and You Shi.

PC_KOL_136301790.desc: Triggered by talking to Qin Sheng.

PC_KOL_136301791.desc: Triggered by talking to Li Meichen.

PC_KOL_136301792.desc: Triggered by talking to Xiaoshan during Chen hour and You hour.

PC_KOL_136301794.desc: Triggered by talking to Lin Ye between Chen Shi and You Shi.

PC_KOL_136301795.desc: Triggered by interacting with the disaster bird.

PC_KOL_136301801.desc: During the Chen hour and the You hour, trigger conversations with passers-by to unlock insights.

PC_KOL_136301807.desc: Triggered by eavesdropping on Han Zhao's conversation.

PC_KOL_136301808.desc: Triggered by dialogue with Wang Shanshan.

PC_KOL_136301810.desc: Complete Volume 2 of the Unseen Mountain: Yougu Pengpeng, and it will be triggered by talking to Bu Hui and Bu Dong in Chenshi-Sishi.

PC_KOL_136301812.desc: Complete the Volume 2 of the Unseen Mountain: Yougu Pengpeng, advance the Knowledge of Everything and Xiantian Talk, and obtain the item Tian Laosan’s account book. Give Tian Laosan’s account book to Mo Yu at any time to trigger it.

PC_KOL_136301813.desc: Complete Volume 2 of the Unseen Mountain: There is Valley Pengpeng, and interact with the stone tablet near the boundary monument: Clear Water and Cloud Waves to trigger it.

PC_KOL_136301814.desc: After completing Volume 2 of the Unseen Mountain: Arigu Pengpeng, in Crow's room, interact with the painting next to the bed to trigger it.

PC_KOL_136301815.desc: Complete the Volume 2 of the Unseen Mountain: There are Valley Peng Peng and the mission: Go straight up to the sky, and it will be triggered by talking to Zhao Buju from Xu Shi to Mao Shi.

PC_KOL_145401838.desc: Eavesdropping on the conversation between Master Qiongqi near Liujinpo triggers insights

PC_KOL_145401840.desc: Eavesdropping on the conversation between Master Qiongqi near Liujinpo triggers insights

PC_KOL_145401843.desc: At night, listen to the conversation between NPCs Yi Qing and Chang Lijuan to gain insights.

PC_KOL_145401853.desc: Talk to Uncle Shan to get the information (if you don't get it, you can sit next to Uncle Shan for a while)

PC_KOL_145401854.desc: You need to complete Knowledge of Everything, The Sun and the Moon in Your Eyes, and talk to Zhang Wanshi in the Heart of Mo Shou to gain insights.

PC_KOL_145401862.desc: You can get it by talking to Xia Yixuan and Lu Ye

PC_KOL_145401863.desc: You can get it by talking to He Buxian and Ying Yelan

PC_KOL_145401876.desc: Talk to Yan Si first. There is an NPC named Zhang Bi in the north direction and you can get it after talking to them.

PC_KOL_167561778.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Mao Lu southwest of the Yimofang boundary monument at Chenshi-Youshi.

PC_KOL_167561779.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to Wang Lu on the east side of the Yimofang boundary monument at Chenshi-Youshi.

PC_KOL_167561783.desc: Triggered by eavesdropping on Wei Li's conversation.

PC_KOL_167561784.desc: Arrive near Siguoju and trigger the guard's conversation to unlock information.

PC_KOL_167561785.desc: Triggered by talking to Bai Po and Wen An between Chen Shi and You Shi.

PC_KOL_167561793.desc: Triggered by dialogue with Cheng Zhoupan.

PC_KOL_167561797.desc: Triggered by talking to Qiu Siwei between Chen Shi and You Shi.

PC_KOL_167561798.desc: Triggered by eavesdropping on the conversation between Cao Yu and Lin Miaoquan at Chen Shi-You Shi.

PC_KOL_167561799.desc: Triggered by talking to Su Xiaobao in Chengshi-Maoshi.

PC_KOL_167561800.desc: During Chen hour and You hour, it is triggered by eavesdropping on Lian Runming's words. If Lian Runming does not appear after the ranger adjusts the time, you can adjust the time again and have a look~ (it will also appear at night, but the probability is higher during the day)
