PC_KOL_302051682.desc: Go to the area around the Bird Rock and observe He Qiu who is praying to unlock it.

1020029;9400006__.desc:
Foreign merchants brought what they had seen along the way, saying that envoys from the Tang State in the south had recently come to Qinghe. According to legend, these envoys came to obtain scriptures!

Cui Daniu, you can gain insights by talking to him before burning the village (you can make up for the mistakes through friends online after burning the village): Messenger of the Southern Tang Dynasty

1020184;1026088__.desc:
The profiteer Tang Bao comes to Bu Xian Xian to fight against the autumn wind again, but this time he tells you that he intends to buy the formula for making Li Ren Tears and pays ten times the price. But you know, Uncle Zhou will not sell it to him.

Tang Bao. Dialogue can unlock information: Request for purchase recipe.

1020224;9400040__.desc:
Many years ago, a mysterious thief appeared in the Immortal Crossing and stole Han Xiangxun's most precious treasure. The villagers are spreading the word that Han Xiangxun has been looking for that treasure for a long time.

Zhang Dazhuang. Talk before burning the village to gain insights (after burning the village, you can connect with friends to make up for the omissions): Shenxiandu was stolen.

1020252;9400010__.desc:
It is not easy to make wine songs that make people cry. The pear flower petals need to be collected with a wind bag first, and then ground into powder. Finally, the pear flower powder is mixed into the koji powder to make koji. With the help of distiller's yeast, Liren's Tears can be successfully made.

Shuang'er. After burning the village, you can get information from this dialogue: Lihua Liquor.

1020254;9400014__.desc:
During the Khitan War, it was Han Xiangxun who took in those wandering people. Slowly, together they built today's Shenxiandu.

Tian Gu. Dialogue can help you trace past events. And what we have seen: wandering has something to offer.

1020255;9400005__.desc:
People in the village all remember Jiang Daxia who left Shenxiandu. Some villagers even hoped that it would be great if Jiang Daxia and Han Xiangxun were a couple. But since Jiang Daxia left the world, no one in the village has seen him again.

Uncle Mi. Talk before burning the village to gain insights (after burning the village, you can connect with friends to make up for the omissions): The missing person.

1020437;9400013__.desc:
Shenxiandujin has two specialties, one is Liren Tears and the other is Lihualin. The tears of the departed people make the drink fragrant, the pear blossoms in the forest are as white as snow, and if the Drunk Fairy Moon comes, it will be a grand scene in the world, which I believe is joyful.

Song Wu. You can gain insights by talking before burning the village (you can make up for the mistakes through friends online after burning the village): Southern accent.
Pay attention to the Geography·Shenxiandu on the stool in front. After picking it up, you can unlock the knowledge: customs and history.
There are also props from Wanshizhi [Abyss of Desire] and [One Book with Wanli Profits] that should be picked up.

1020548;9400004__.desc:
On the Immortal Crossing at night, two weird-looking guys are whispering to each other. You accidentally get a map of the Immortal Crossing from them, and you don’t know what their purpose is.

As an outsider, before burning the village, use Star Photographer to get the map of the Immortal Crossing on him to unlock the information: Sneaky Traces

1020557;1020559;1020561;9400193__.desc:
Take the sweet and fragrant pear flowers and store them in raw silk bags. Dip them into three buckets of drink. The fragrance will be clear and unstained.

Exploring the facilities next to the natural history can unlock information: Agarwood Pear Chips

1020574;9400012__.desc:
You accidentally heard that the old rooster in the Fairy Crossing told you that he had seen a thief steal Jia Fu's money bag.

If you have the ability to communicate with all beasts here, you can also trigger the knowledge of the river frog next to it: the treasure thief.

1020607;2500370__.desc:
Every year, Han Xiangxun brings the first jar of wine here to worship an old friend. You have seen the tombstone and know that it is the tomb of brother Han Xiangxun. But Han Xiangxun never told you what kind of person her brother was and why there was a tomb here.

Exploring the tombstone here, you will get information: The long-dead person.

1040185;9400009__.desc:
Suddenly there are some strange guys in Shenxiandu. Some are asking for the entrance to the village, some are exploring the floods at the mouth of the river, and some are grabbing children and insisting on asking why Zuixianyue was founded. If you meet them again, you must give them a show!

Uncle Zhang Jiu. Conversation unlocks natural history and knowledge: inquiring about information

2500108;2500082;2510022;2500096__.desc:
Hundreds of people in the town lost their livelihoods after Emperor Shizong ordered to exterminate the Buddha. They didn't understand why their good deeds throughout their lives led to such bad consequences. So A Huai, a Buddhist carver named Yang, proposed to go to the Bodhi Sea of ​​Bitterness to find out what happened. Something terrible must have happened there, causing all the Buddhist carvers to never return.

Panming Mine. If you talk to You Shi while drinking here, you can unlock the story: The Tragedy of the Sea of ​​Bitterness. (If that doesn’t work, go and talk to Yang Shanpo again later)

2510025;2510036;2500041__.desc:
One day, the messenger of Buddha flowers came to the town with his believers, telling everyone about the benefits of worshiping Buddha flowers. Perhaps in order to find some solace in their poor life, the common people who had no way to make a living due to the decline of Buddhist carving craftsmanship chose to obey and gradually fell into the seductive temptation.

Buddhist believers. After talking to most of the townspeople (especially the four Buddha Flower Believers to learn about Buddha Flowers, Chen Shizhou's dialogue with Miao Xin, Xie Wangshan at night, and Little Chisel to learn about Ci Xin Town), you can unlock the knowledge: Buddha Flower Belief

3611781630230540__.desc:
There are four major surnames in Cixin Town: Yang, Zhou, Pan, and Xie. For some reason, the Yang family is marginalized by the Zhou family. The behavior of adults affected the children, and the children in the town were very unfriendly to Yang Xiaoyao. What did the Yang family do wrong?

Shen Shi talks to three children: Zhou Miaoxin, Xie Deyi, and Pan Faxin. Unlockable Insight: The Bullied Child

7800031;7800033__.desc:
Hongxian's mother passed away early, and Uncle Zhou had no control over Hongxian. Gradually, Hongxian became a naughty and crazy girl in the eyes of the villagers.

Yueniang, after burning the village, talk to unlock the information: the red line to be strong.

PC_KOL_226711622.desc: Go to the pier on the lower left side of the Millennium Crossing Monument and talk to Qiusuo to unlock it.

PC_KOL_302051621.desc: Go to the boat on the lower left side of the Millennium Crossing Monument and talk to Old Man Ren to unlock it.

PC_KOL_302051629.desc: Go to the dock on the lower left side of the Millennium Crossing Monument and talk to Li Qiantu to unlock it.

1020551;9400007__.desc:
A group of strange pigeons appeared on the Immortal Crossing, with secret messages from a mysterious organization tied to their legs. The letter said: Holding the token with the flame dragon pattern, you can connect with the organization's hidden line at the dock of Buxianxian.

Carp girl. After the conversation, you can unlock the information: Strange Pigeon Secret Message.

1025061;9400011__.desc:
The female guest in green clothes, who is more attractive than the pear blossoms, seems to know the pear blossoms planted by Shenxiandu. They are the pear blossoms transplanted by Han Xiangxun from his hometown.

Xia Aze. After the conversation, you will unlock the information: Hometown Pear Blossom.

6900800;6901284__.desc:
Talk to Qi Qin on the second floor of Fan Tower
Insights·Guests from all over the world
Zuihuayin's singing and dancing are famous all over the world. Guests from all over the world will travel thousands of miles to Kaifeng to enjoy the feast together.

6900980;6900983__.desc:
Talk to She Bo on the third floor of Fan Tower
Insights: Duxiu Pavilion in Fanlou
The most luxurious wing on the third floor of Fan Tower is called Duxiu Pavilion, which means "a cluster of flowers, with peonies at the head; a gathering of heroes, a single branch stands out". Those who can occupy the Duxiu Pavilion are all extraordinary figures in the court.

6901306;6901363;6901295__.desc:
A few years ago, Qin Mo Bingxian and Duan Zhen met with the rhythm geniuses Jiang Yi and Hua Xinfeng Han Wei at the beautiful lake of Drunken Flower Yin, and agreed to determine the winner with ten pieces of music. Unfortunately, due to various reasons, nine of the ten songs ended that year, but even so, this appointment is still a legendary event that is talked about in the martial arts and music circles.

Wen Chang, Xiang Pengyuan. Unlock the information after the conversation: Ten Songs of Yanhu

2500092;2500099__.desc:
Zhiwenliu. It is said that during the previous dynasty, Sejong had a meeting with Elder Le, the director of the Wenjin Museum, and decided to use this to leave scholars from all over the world here to advise the country.

willow. Unlock knowledge after exploration: Yanagi Chihiro

6800984;6800986__.desc:
The food menu of Wubi Inn seems to hide some secret. All menus are composed of place name, grade and food. The latest dish is Kaifeng's top spicy pig ears - this corresponds to the monitoring of public opinion in Kaifeng, and if necessary, those who spread rebellious remarks can be killed on the spot.

Wu Twelve Niangs. Unlock the information after the conversation: Secret food list

PC_KOL_136301615.desc: Come here in the future and talk to Jun Youning who is hoeing the ground, and the four Qingxi disciples Qi Sixian (sitting at the door of the house next to here), Ji Mingsang and Qiu Mingxuan (right in front of Zhao Waibao, a friend of Jianghu in Jiezilu) to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181504.desc: Come here in Youshi, talk to Qi Sixian who is sitting, and select [Wenjin Pavilion...] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181514.desc: Come here and talk to Wang Qisou at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181516.desc: Come here and talk to He Kongshan at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181519.desc: Come here at noon and talk to Cang Qing to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181525.desc: It can be unlocked by eavesdropping on people in the house at midnight.

PC_KOL_148181529.desc: Come here and talk to Cui Gui in the future to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181547.desc: Chenshi comes here to talk to Yu Niang and select [Ask about Ferry] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_226711836.desc: You need to defeat the Four Seas High Roller: Gao Jisi and then come here and talk to him to get it.

PC_KOL_311631500.desc: Come here at noon to talk to Bai Mingxing and choose [Who is fighting with you? ] to unlock.

PC_KOL_311631501.desc: Why should I come here to have a conversation at noon? I chose [Collecting herbs? 】 to unlock.

PC_KOL_311631505.desc: Come to the house at Xu time and talk to Murong Xinyi to unlock it.

PC_KOL_311631510.desc: Come here at noon to have a conversation with Ping Wuzhang. Select [Why] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_311631513.desc: Come here to eavesdrop on the waiter at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_311631518.desc: Come here and have a conversation at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_311631520.desc: Come here in Xu Shi and talk to Uncle Wang to unlock it.

PC_KOL_311631527.desc: Come here in the future to talk to Su Huaiwei and select [Jie Zi Lu] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_57931833.desc: Obtained by interacting with the old thing: new blue shoes

PC_KOL_74611503.desc: Come here at noon to talk to Yang Shangen and select [Why did you say this] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611506.desc: Come here to talk to Gao Jisi and choose [Contest? 】 to unlock. Remember to steal the mission props from his backpack.

PC_KOL_74611507.desc: Come here to talk to Zhu Fengying in Youshi, and select [Your business is good] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611508.desc: Come here to talk to Tang Ming at noon and choose [Yixiandun, so elegant! 】 to unlock.

PC_KOL_74611509.desc: Come here and talk to Ren Xia to start the rhythm performance, Yujiaojiao Shang, you can unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611515.desc: Come here and talk to Ultramarine at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611517.desc: Come here and talk to Song Sangniang at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611530.desc: Come here and talk to Yang Shouxi in Xushi to unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611546.desc:
It can be unlocked by completing the game here.
The pre-remnant chapter [My Friend] is here.

PC_KOL_95221499.desc: Come here at noon to talk to Xuan Guigui and choose [Buying medicinal materials? 】 to unlock.

PC_KOL_95221502.desc: Come here at noon to talk to Fengmei, choose [What are you busy with? 】 to unlock.

PC_KOL_95221511.desc: Come here and talk to Lingchuan at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_95221512.desc: Come here and talk to Wei Jin at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_95221524.desc: After completing the Knowledge of All Things [Essence on Ice], you can unlock the knowledge by coming here after a while to talk to Du Cheng, who has disgraced you.

PC_KOL_95221526.desc: Come here in the future to talk to Su Huaiwei and choose [Are you a doctor? 】, then talk to Granny Deer to unlock it.

PC_KOL_95221528.desc: Come here and talk to Yang Mutian in the future to unlock it.

PC_KOL_148181494.desc: Look at the bounty on the wall to unlock it.

PC_KOL_311631495.desc: Read the letter on the box to unlock it.

PC_KOL_74611497.desc: The first time you come here will trigger a battle, and then you can unlock it after talking to Meng Jichuan here.

PC_KOL_95221496.desc: Read the letter on the stone to unlock it.

PC_KOL_16301308.desc:
There is a pool at the foot of Liangzhou City, and the water is like wine. It is said that Huo Qubing defeated the Xiongnu and obtained ten jars of royal wine. He poured the wine into the pool and drank it with the soldiers.

Conversation with Xin Liujian, gaining insights: pouring wine into the pool.

PC_KOL_16301309.desc:
That princess once spent all her dowry to build canals and weirs for the people of Liangzhou to solve Liangzhou's hydrological problems. Now, the princess has passed away and the fortress has been destroyed, but her story continues with the water of the Yuchi.

Touch the stone tablet to gain insights: scattered gold to build a fortress.

PC_KOL_16301310.desc:
Before she got married, a poet once dedicated hundreds of poems to the princess. But what the princess likes the most is the sentence she got on the way - the wind travels ten thousand miles, and the destination is Chang'an.

Conversation with Mingying at night to gain insights: Poems from the Desert.

PC_KOL_16301316.desc:
Purple pearls hang down from ghost vines without fragrance, and yin and yang are cut off at the broken places of ruins smoke. It is said that the ghosts of Tengwang villagers couldn't bear to see the decline of their former homes, so they returned every night and continued to live as they did in life.

Talk to An A'er at noon and gain insights: Man and ghost share the same roof.

PC_KOL_16301319.desc:
Under the rule of the Guiyi Army, taxes were levied according to the size of the land, and the money collected was changed to cloth. The overall implementation of "10% tax" increased the money in the hands of the villagers.

Talk to Gao Wensheng and gain insights: Pay taxes based on the territory.

PC_KOL_16301321.desc:
Qingyu'an Zhuoyufang has been rushing to make a batch of luminous cups recently, preparing to send them to Tianshuiji and be taken to Chang'an by the Guiyi Army.

Talk to Xi Yu during the day and get information: Gui Yijun's order.

PC_KOL_16301323.desc:
It is difficult for the apprentices of the Jade-carving Workshop to learn the "special" jade-carving method of their master Lu Li. This is because Lu Li, who lost his arms, uses his mouth to cut the jade, and his skill lies in his mouth and not in his hands.

During the day, they talked with Qin Yuqiang (red circle) and Fan Xuan (inside the house with red circle). At night, they spied on Lu Li (square frame) and gained insights: the method of carving jade.

PC_KOL_16301325.desc:
Qing Yu'an Zhuo Yufang was once famous for its Hotan jade works. Later, the jade road was cut off. A Jianghu man found Qilian jade for Zhuo Yufang and made the first Qilian jade cup "Ye Guangming".

Eavesdrop on the conversation between Jiang Ruinian/Wu Dingbo at night and gain insights: The Jade Picker.

PC_KOL_16301326.desc:
After the first Qilian jade cup "Ye Guangming" was produced at the Qing Yuan Zhuo Jade Workshop, the workshop became deserted overnight and remained abandoned for more than ten years. Rumor has it that the missing jade workers are related to a "cup feast".

Talk to the maid of the Cao family during the day (marked in red) and get information: the missing jade worker.

PC_KOL_16301337.desc:
Zhang Huaishen was born in Kuanglan and was sent to study art by his uncle Zhang Yichao.

Talk to Yang Sangang during the day and get information: Born in Kuanglan.

PC_KOL_16301338.desc:
People in Liangzhou commemorated Zhang Yichao's deeds and composed songs for him. Even though Zhang Yichao is about to return to Tang Dynasty thousands of miles away, this kindness will still be remembered by Liangzhou from generation to generation.

Talk to Tang Yuee and gain insights: The song will last forever.

PC_KOL_16301346.desc:
Liangzhou has been a land of fine wine since ancient times, and its grape wine is the best in the world. Someone once offered a liter of fine wine to an official to pay homage to the governor, which shows that the reputation of Liangzhou wine is well-deserved. The world-famous wine can be enjoyed with just a scoop in Liangzhou.

Talk to Puzi and gain insights: the land of fine wine.

PC_KOL_16301405.desc:
There are tens of thousands of scriptures stored in the Sutra Pavilion of the Reclining Buddha Temple. Liangzhou people, whether officials at all levels or traders and soldiers, often come here to copy scriptures and pray for their parents, family members, teachers, monks, and the king of the country.

Talk to Huizhen during the day and gain insights: Sutra Copying Dojo.

PC_KOL_16301407.desc:
There is a forest of fragrant snow on the mountain behind the Reclining Buddha Temple. After Zhang Yichao regained Liangzhou, the temple became more and more popular. This plum forest was donated by pilgrims.

Talk to Huining during the day and gain knowledge: Forest of Fragrant Snow.

PC_KOL_16301471.desc: It can be unlocked by talking to the Path Sweeper.

PC_KOL_266771312.desc:
Although Tengwang Village has declined, during the Qingming Festival and Cold Food Festival, Xingjiat can still be seen going to the old graveyard outside the village to pay homage to his deceased friends. These people were all those who benefited from the villagers' porridge and shoes, and the care of their goods and medical camels during the booming business travels in the past.

Talk to Zhang Sanshui and gain insights: He has passed away.

PC_KOL_266771313.desc:
Grapes and fine wines are said to be kings of vines, and precious swords can be exchanged for wine. Tengwang Village is rich in Tengwang grapes, a rare variety that makes fine wine. The wine made from the first round of juice is especially precious and sold as far away as Chang'an.

Talk to An Ada at Sishi and get some information: Vine King Grape.

PC_KOL_266771314.desc:
Although Tengwang Village is now empty of ten houses, there are still businessmen who come to visit it due to its former fame. They conspire with the disabled households to revive the vineyard and restore its former glory.

Talk to Kang Pu Niang at night and gain insights: Hu Shang’s business.

PC_KOL_266771324.desc:
Khotan in the Western Region is rich in Hotan jade, which is highly relied upon by relatives in the Central Plains. However, due to the long journey to the east, jade works were often damaged along the way, so jade merchants mostly sent raw warm jade to Liangzhou for jade processing, carving into objects, and then transporting them to Chang'an for sale.

Talk to Ling Heng and gain knowledge: The Road to Jade.

PC_KOL_266771328.desc:
On the beams and columns of Feijing Pavilion, there were originally many homesick poems left by literati. However, due to the war, the pavilion was damaged. In order to preserve these treasures, Governor Zhang specially invited teachers in the city to write them down on poetry boards.

Talk to Chen Antai and gain insights: the meaning of looking back home.

PC_KOL_266771332.desc:
On the surface, Tianshuiji looks calm, but secretly someone has been planning to sabotage the celebration and disrupt Zhang Yichao's return to the Tang Dynasty.

Eavesdropping on Shang Jieluo's conversation at night and gaining insights: Under the quiet stream.

PC_KOL_266771334.desc:
Some people in Tianshui were very dissatisfied with the rule of the Guiyi Army. They missed the past life and secretly planned to sabotage the celebration of Guiyi.

Talk to Nobu Shuang and get the information: Celebration Dark Wave.

PC_KOL_266771339.desc:
Liangzhou City was built in the Five Liang Period, and the construction was started by Zhang Gui, the governor of that year.

Talk to Wu Hui at night and gain knowledge: Zhang Gui built the city.

PC_KOL_266771340.desc:
The temple with brightly lit candles next to the market building is a quiet and quiet temple for Buddhism, and it is also the place where the Aoist religion burns fire.

Talk to Wu Hui during the day and gain insights: Buddha and coat coexist.

PC_KOL_266771410.desc:
People in Liangzhou often meet a handsome man traveling with his children. The doll seems to be very close to the elder brother, one is older and the other is younger, and they are happy with each other.

Talk to Wu Hanqiao during the day and gain insights: let’s go together.

PC_KOL_59091322.desc:
The younger brother who is very good at craftsmanship but doesn't care about jade, the senior sister who understands jade but can't grind it. People who carve jade have different shapes and colors, but they have the same thoughts.

Eavesdrop on the conversation between the two and gain insights: the jade-carvering man.

PC_KOL_59091327.desc:
There is an old saying circulating in Liangzhou - "Foreigners tasting Liangzhou wine will be drunk for three nights." Liangzhou's wine springs are so mellow and intoxicating that the locals can't stop drinking them, but outsiders can stay drunk for several nights just by drinking the wind.

Talk to Cao Wei during the day and gain insights: Drunk for three nights.

PC_KOL_59091329.desc:
The soldiers of the Guiyi Army had different attitudes towards returning to the Tang Dynasty. Some soldiers felt that the Tang Dynasty was afraid of them, and returning to the Tang Dynasty was not necessarily a good thing.

Eavesdropping on Zhang Tie's conversation during the day and gaining insights: the imperial court's fear.

PC_KOL_59091330.desc:
According to militiaman Miluoduo, since the Guiyi army defeated Mutun and recaptured Tianshuiji, they, the foreign businessmen, have been living a good life.

Talk to Milodo and gain information: Prosperity.

PC_KOL_59091331.desc:
Due to different attitudes towards the return to Tang Dynasty, conflicts broke out within the Guiyi Army.

Eavesdrop on the conversations in the house during the day and gain insights: the storm is surging.

PC_KOL_59091333.desc:
According to the predecessors of Xingxu Tower, the Tang Dynasty was always wary of the Guiyi Army. There was a mystery behind Zhang Yichao's return to the Tang Dynasty, and this played into their hands.

Talk to Gyatso Scar and gain insights: This is a righteousness that is hard to return.

PC_KOL_59091335.desc:
The performances of the magic troupe are deeply loved by the people of Tianshuiji. But recently, the absence of Weng Niangzi and Xiao Man made them a little disappointed.

Talk to Chen Aling and get insights: The Trick Troupe.

PC_KOL_59091342.desc:
On a rainy night two years ago, Zen Master Huiyuan, the abbot of Wugou Pagoda, and a group of disciples sacrificed their lives to protect the wounded soldiers returning to the rebel army, fought to the death with the enemy, and finally sacrificed their lives. This was an act of repaying the kindness of the country and all living beings.

Have a conversation and gain insights: Ye Yu.

PC_KOL_59091343.desc:
Jingsu once exchanged a piece of information from the enemy for life-saving money, and then witnessed the monks of Wugou Pagoda fighting to the death with the enemy. I don't know whether it was due to excessive fear or a guilty conscience, but Jingzu eventually went crazy. He spent his whole life trapped on the three stone steps, wiping the blood stains from his heart that could not be removed.

Conversation with Zen Master Huiyuan to gain insights: Purify sins.

PC_KOL_59091344.desc:
General Xiao Zhang has a good family background, good character, and good looks. He always takes great interest in him every time he goes on a blind date. But almost all the young ladies in Tianshuiji have met him, and they are still unmarried. There is only one word for the reason: busy. Busy-

Eavesdrop on the conversation between passers-by A, B, and C, and gain insights: Unmarried...hate?.

PC_KOL_59091347.desc:
There are drums set up in the market buildings, and they are beaten to open and close the market gates. During the recent Tianshui Lantern Festival, the drumming here was temporarily suspended and was handed over to the Guiyi Army.

Touch the market drum (marked in red) to gain insights: beat the drum to control the market.

PC_KOL_59091409.desc:
He left his precious wealth among thousands of images and placed golden lamps in thousands of niches. The Jiedu Envoy of the Guiyi Army funded the construction of the Gongde Cave here, and the construction of the cave took maybe three or five years. However, when doctors and craftsmen in the painting studio heard that the caves were being built for the Guiyi Army, they all regarded it as a meritorious deed and worked for it for free, or donated all their wages to the temple.

Talk to Jiang Ren during the day and gain information: Build a merit cave.

PC_KOL_98901311.desc:
Yu traces visit
In the past, Yang Guanke, a disciple of Kuanglan, and his friends visited Jade Terrace and exchanged swords for wine in Tengwang Village, which became a good story. Although the old name of Teng Wang is no longer what it used to be, there are still many disciples of Kuanglan who come here to visit him.

Dialogue with Tan Yishu to gain insights: Yu Ji Shen Ye.

PC_KOL_98901315.desc:
According to historical records, Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty made wine at his own expense, which was of eight colors, fragrant, pungent, strong, and rich in taste. The villagers of Tengwang imitated Taizong's elegance and also used Tengwang grapes to make colored wine.

Talk to Kang Bose at night and get insights: Bose wine.

PC_KOL_98901317.desc:
When the vine king's beads hang down, a grape feast will begin. The living drink fresh fermented grains, the dead enjoy the smell of wine, and the intersection of yin and yang makes the souls connect.

Zishi talked to Pei Qingbei and gained information: The Grape Banquet of the Vine King.

PC_KOL_98901318.desc:
There used to be a wonderful scene of "Buddha bell attracting white sparrow" in Baique Sutra Pavilion. But one day, the Buddha bell fell into the jade pond, and the auspiciousness of the sutra pavilion was no longer there.

Conversation to realize stillness and gain insights: The Buddha bell attracts the white sparrow.

PC_KOL_98901320.desc:
Beside the clear jade bank, the people of Liangzhou raised their glasses and sang softly - "The moon breaks into jade, jade becomes wine, and when people drink wine, it becomes moonlight."

Conversation is easy for spring, and you can gain insights: the moon and jade, wine and people.

PC_KOL_98901336.desc:
It is said that Zhang Yichao was at odds with Zhang Huaishen's uncle and nephew, and the two had a grudge to kill their father." General Zhang Yichao's father was killed by General Zhang Yichao.

Stand next to the red box mark and wait for the three people to speak, triggering the information: Revenge for killing the father.

PC_KOL_98901341.desc:
Zhang Yichao regained most of Hexi, and Hexi was now at peace. Caravans can reach all the way from Liangzhou to Chang'an.

Talk to Dou Lutuo and gain insights: The merchant's path.

PC_KOL_98901345.desc:
Wherever Zhang Yichao went, he carried out major construction projects to improve people's livelihood. While repairing soldiers' armor, he restored farmland, giving the local people a completely new look.

Talk to Sun Mengliang and gain insights: Repairing armor and cultivating crops.

PC_KOL_98901406.desc:
The Jiedu Envoy of the Guiyi Army has recently been preparing for a sutra-transfer ceremony, and he needs to borrow the collection of the Mahaprajna Sutra that is being edited by the temple for translation. This matter seems to be related to the situation in Liangzhou. Perhaps Jiedu made this move in order to wish peace and tranquility for the city and peace for the people.

During the day, eavesdrop on the conversation at the mark in the picture in the house to gain insights: the sutra-turning ceremony.

PC_KOL_98901408.desc:
Hundreds of years ago, an eminent monk passed by Wuwei and said that a natural Buddha statue would appear in the mountain, and the rise and fall of Liangzhou depended on it. One day, the Reclining Buddha actually appeared out of thin air in Wuwei Mountain, and the Reclining Buddha Temple was built accordingly. Many people come here to worship Buddha just for a common wish.

During the day, talk to Hui De/Hui Cheng and gain insights: the statue of the Reclining Buddha.

PC_KOL_267431229.desc:
During the decisive battle of Baektu City, someone had been secretly transporting food to Baektu City, and this was how Baektu City stood firm.

Talk to Aba and select [Pay for information] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_269911231.desc:
Even if they die, even if it takes so long that they have forgotten many things, the soldiers of Baektu City still do not forget the faith in their hearts.

Talk to the lost soldier on the ground to unlock it.

PC_KOL_98901404.desc:
The old things that carry children's wishes can be seen again, but I wonder, has the dream of being a general come true now?

Read the letter in front of you and gain insights: A promise from childhood.

PC_KOL_116131175.desc:
There is a well in the village, the source of which is said to be snow water from the mountains. The villagers of Karzi guard it day and night, as if guarding the only hope in the desolate desert.

Unlocked by talking to Hu Yushan at noon.

PC_KOL_116131177.desc:
According to word of mouth among the traveling merchants, only people from Karzi can sense the wind direction and predict sandstorms. The business of Desert Station has made many people jealous, but no one has been able to shake Karzi's status.

When Chenshi comes here to eavesdrop on Du Xiaoyan, he can unlock the information.

PC_KOL_116131178.desc:
The hustle and bustle of Karzi is increasing day by day, and the crowds and camels are intertwined. Several villagers carried tools and built camel stations nearby, giving the camels a place to rest.

Talk to Zhang Shi and select [Camel Station] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_116131185.desc:
Fan Liangji has been waiting for a person who has left to come back to him. The tea stall expresses the hope that travelers will always have a place to stay. All the waiting will be worth it when the important person returns.

Come here at Mao Shi and talk to Fan Liangji. Select [What is this] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_116131195.desc:
The hustle and bustle in Karzi is increasing day by day, and this excitement makes some people feel uneasy. They secretly plan to stay away from right and wrong, and when they leave, they are destined to say goodbye to some people.

Come here at noon to eavesdrop on the conversation to unlock it.

PC_KOL_116131200.desc:
Someone once opened another road to the other side of the moon, but the Anxi army did not leave through this road. Instead, they used sand boats to send away the coffins of the Pao Ze people.

It can be unlocked by talking to Hu Xiu at noon.

PC_KOL_116131201.desc:
The poverty of the people of Xuli is like the death of camels from the white Milky Way; the wealth of the people of Xuli is like the collapse of the yellow sand slopes by the golden mountains. During the prosperous Tang Dynasty, the Xili people monopolized trade on the Silk Road and earned gold from the world.

Come here and eavesdrop on Elken at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_116131209.desc:
After learning that Ma Tou Village has water again, the displaced villagers are returning. They followed the teachings of their ancestors and embarked on the same journey again.

Come here and talk to Zhang Xi at Haishi, and select [What are you looking for] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_116131212.desc:
Some people in Yumen Pass will hear the call from Baitou City, but those who answer the call never come back.

Come here when you are young and talk to Sha Feifei in the pit, then use construction to build the shed and talk again to unlock the information.

PC_KOL_116131233.desc:
As a precious tool for well diggers, it was damaged and abandoned here. Wipe the dust off, and you can still hear the voices of their owners quarreling.

The entrance is in the ruins of Wenqu Canal in Ma Tou Village. Walk along the road from the well and interact with [Ax Chisel] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_130251179.desc:
Tang Qi discovered that whenever someone mentioned Xuanquanyi, the villagers in Karzi would always pay more attention.

Talk to Tang Qi and choose [How do you know? 】 to unlock.

PC_KOL_130251183.desc:
The villagers of Karzi are keenly aware that the whistling sound of wind and sand is becoming more frequent. As a result, the market in the village became more bustling, and rumors spread - for example, strange figures appeared in Xuanquanyi.

You can unlock it when you come here to eavesdrop on the conversation between Zhang Shi and Hu Nuer.

PC_KOL_130251197.desc:
The Camel Station was built near Karzi. It was originally used as a place to take care of camels. People worked in the Camel Station during the day and returned to Karzi to rest at night. Gradually, Luotuoyi developed a unique style and temperament, and some people chose to settle here.

Come here to talk to Tuotuo at noon, and select [Chat about Camel Station] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_130251204.desc:
After the Anshi Rebellion, the Silk Road, which once carried caravans under the shelter of the Tang Dynasty, was now fragmented by various forces. The Tang Dynasty squeezed out Hu merchants, and Bo Chen Yutu rushed to collect money. The profitable merchants who have cut off their trade routes are like Populus euphratica seeds floating in the wind and sand of the desert.
Young Kang Pearl needs to find new ways.

Come here and interact with the glowing ledger props to unlock them.

PC_KOL_130251205.desc:
The formation of Populus euphratica forest here depends entirely on the underground channels connecting the water sources of the snow-capped mountains. However, the construction process of culverts is complicated and requires a good understanding of underground waterways, which makes it impossible for Xili people to build them. Fortunately, Hu Yangji had the help of the Han army, and the matter also involved a transaction: the Han general helped the Xuli people dig wells, and the Xuli merchant helped the Han people chase the moon.

You can unlock it by talking to Nobanduo and Kangmi in turn.

PC_KOL_130251207.desc:
The bandits at Yumen Pass seem to be adhering to some bottom line. They will only attack businessmen who are ruthless in their pursuit of wealth.

Come here and eavesdrop at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_130251211.desc:
There are several notebooks stacked inside the box, with the word "Cunxiu" written on the title page. They record the craftsman’s experience in forging well-digging tools for the people of Ma Tou Village, and carry the hope of finding water sources in the desert.

Come here to interact with [Tools] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_130251234.desc:
The traces of the note inside the bottle have been blurred, and the words "Pray for...high mountain snow and water...bless...home" can be vaguely seen. It once carried hope floating on the water, but now it can only lie silent in the sand.

Go into the well from the broken chapter [Ask How Big is the Canal] in Ma Tou Village and pick up the small bottle here to unlock it.

PC_KOL_130251236.desc:
A pair of lovers simply play while digging a well, and the two names are always paired. The last name is left somewhere in the well, quietly waiting for another name to be completed.

At the location of [Ask How Much Canal Is It], select [Engrave Name] to unlock the knowledge and obtain the appearance [Bridal Makeup]

PC_KOL_130251241.desc:
In the past, Wangantun was once a production place for the Baek Tou Army, but for some unknown reason, the village is now deserted.

Come here at noon and talk to the lost traveler to unlock it.

PC_KOL_266771267.desc:
The sound of the flute that Wu Feng heard echoed not only on the way to Fangpan City - now wherever the wind blows, you can see a person walking on the sand and swimming in the vast sea.

Talk to Wu Feng here, and you can unlock it after completing the exploration mission to obtain the magical skill [Qiao Yin Qian Lang].

Prerequisite: Complete the incomprehensible [Si Zhu Ya Yun] here

PC_KOL_267431176.desc:
Zhang Shi, who took care of the camels, often asked for old iron products from the merchants who came and went, and secretly sent them to his house. There seems to be no place in the village that is particularly in need of iron tools. What became of these old irons is unknown.

Stop here for a while and listen to the conversation between these two merchants to unlock insights.

PC_KOL_267431180.desc:
There are not many places to stay in the village, but there is a house with all kinds of learning supplies. All kinds of utensils inside are tailor-made according to the height of the children.

Come here and talk to Wei Ziya at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431186.desc:
People have tried to modify the release ritual and apply it to people, but it has no effect. Only those old, seriously ill, and injured camels can be successfully transformed, and only after a lifetime of hard work can they weigh an eternal Boshan furnace.

Come to this teleporter and stay next to it for a while to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431187.desc:
Transforming life forms and connecting the bridge between life and death, this mysterious release ceremony is unknown. The source of its power is the ceremony itself, the old camel handle gesture, or the so-called power of the desert and the will of the land...

Come here at Mao Shi and talk to Tuo Tuo to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431188.desc:
If you make good friends with camels, you won't suffer any loss when walking in the wind and sand. The delicious licorice can make them feel more happy. There is a strange kind of licorice in Yumen Pass, which is particularly fresh and sweet, and is very popular with camels. However, it is still unknown how this licorice is grown.

Give the licorice to An Yandian here at Mao Shi to unlock it. (Licorice picks it up behind Lao Tuo Jia Shi)

PC_KOL_267431191.desc:
The release ceremony originated from the alchemist's money-making tricks. A dying person listened to the alchemist's lies and harmed the camel. After the ceremony, the person still died, but the seriously injured and dying camel was reborn as a Boshan furnace camel.

Talk to Feng Tingting at Mao Shi and select [Chat about Boshan Furnace Camel] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431198.desc:
Most of the camels native to Hexi are Bactrian camels, and in a few cases, exotic dromedary camels can be seen. The Bactrian camel is more cold-tolerant and eats mainly saline-alkali plants in shrubs and semi-shrubs; the dromedary camel is more heat-tolerant and mainly eats grass and salt-tolerant plants. As for the third type of camel...

Come here at noon to talk to Lao Camel Handle, and select [Camel Type] to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431206.desc:
Populus euphratica once became a nearby trading center. At that time, there were countless gold, dazzling gems, non-stop pipa and singing... But the reason why Populus euphratica is called the golden land is not only the wealth, but also the water that is more precious than gold in the desert and will never be cut off.

Come here and talk to Kang Fudan at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431240.desc:
Huo Jiuchuan minted copper coins repeatedly. Failure, recasting... According to what he said, this furnace of coins is what everyone thinks about. But it might just be a mint's reason to numb himself.

Come here and talk to Huo Jiuchuan when you are ugly to unlock it.

PC_KOL_267431242.desc:
Many people say that Baektu City is a dead city, but some travelers once heard someone shouting in pain while spending the night at the gate of the city.

Come here at noon and talk to the panicked Li Si squatting on the ground to unlock it.

PC_KOL_269911182.desc:
The darkening sandstorm a few years ago took away many lives in Karzi and buried an unknown past.

Talk to Wei Ruxian in Youshi and choose [Sandstorm? 】to unlock the information.

PC_KOL_269911184.desc:
The young man once led another group of young people on the trade routes of the Western Regions, and they brought Yue from afar to the Western Regions.

You can unlock it if you come here and have a conversation without changing the gold.

PC_KOL_269911202.desc:
Profitable merchants pursue business opportunities and wealth, and their hometown is where the gold is.
Until one day, Kang Zhenzhen, the leader of the caravan, was drinking with a Han general who was accompanying him, and heard him drunkenly reciting "The dew is white tonight, and the moon is bright in my hometown." The moon is the brightness of her hometown. She stared blankly at the endless golden sand - at the end of the yellow sand, is there also a hometown belonging to the Xili people, a place where gold is brighter than the sun? This is the reason why the Populus euphratica collection was originally established.

Come here and talk to Anpu at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_269911203.desc:
Heroes emerge from troubled times, but the chaotic sandstorm brought about the legend of Kang Zhenzhu. It is difficult for foreign Hu merchants to walk in the chaotic business roads, except for the "Pearl Boat", a post boat from the Tang Dynasty, carrying the caravan's talismans, wine-filled feathers, and hanging tassels with embroidered Buddhist scriptures... This is a merchant ship that can travel between different forces and different nationalities.

Talk to Kang Midan at noon to unlock it.

PC_KOL_269911210.desc:
The bottom of the box is engraved with the word "He", which contains the He family genealogy. Picking up the family tree, there is still a water-seeking blueprint underneath. The fonts on it are strong and powerful, as if they came from the military.

Come here and pick up the small box on the ground to unlock it. And get the prop [Wine Chip]

PC_KOL_269911235.desc:
The Poplar euphratica tree survives for a thousand years when it is alive, survives for a thousand years when it dies, and survives for a thousand years when it falls. Many people think this is just a legend about Populus euphratica. But Lan He, who knows plants well, knows that withered Populus euphratica can really survive for hundreds of years, and can sprout again as long as it encounters water.

NPCs will not appear in this area until you have completed the adventure [Golden Country].

Talk to He Qin in Youshi to unlock the knowledge.

PC_KOL_269911239.desc:
The copper coins cast during the Dali period can be used as Fu Sheng coins, but now there is no one found in the village.

You can unlock it by talking to Ma Balang who is walking around here when you are ugly.

PC_KOL_269911243.desc:
Legend has it that there is a general who shoots the sunset with a golden bow.
The general finally appeared in Wangantun.

Come here at noon and talk to Sopilu to unlock it.

PC_KOL_269911244.desc:
Many years ago, there was a bloody battle in Fangpan City near Ayisu, and the water in Ayisu was formed by the blood-soaked sand.

Know everything beforehand [Wine of the Desert]

Come here at noon and have a conversation with Mu Youren to unlock it.
